Back to Back.name: Back to Back
Back to Back.flavor: You take heart from the ally guarding your back.
Back to Back.effect: You assume the back to back stance. Until the stance ends, while you are adjacent to an ally, you and the ally gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.

Stir the Hornet’s Nest.name: Stir the Hornet’s Nest
Stir the Hornet’s Nest.flavor: You make a vicious strike against your foe, wounding it badly and making it an easy target for your allies’ ranged attacks.
Stir the Hornet’s Nest.requirement: You must make this attack with a heavy thrown weapon.
Stir the Hornet’s Nest.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, each of your allies gains a power bonus to the damage rolls of ranged attacks against the target. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.
Stir the Hornet’s Nest.onMiss: One of your allies can make a ranged basic attack against the target as a free action, with a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Iron Dragon Charge.name: Iron Dragon Charge
Iron Dragon Charge.flavor: Like a rampaging iron dragon, you hurl yourself at your adversary, landing a terrific blow that inspires your allies to charge as well.
Iron Dragon Charge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you charge a creature, choose an ally within 5 squares of where you start the charge. That ally can charge the same creature as an immediate reaction.

Bastion of Defense.name: Bastion of Defense
Bastion of Defense.flavor: You strike your foe a mighty blow, rallying your friends as they witness the path to glory.
Bastion of Defense.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 power bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.
Bastion of Defense.effect: Each ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Hold the Line.name: Hold the Line
Hold the Line.flavor: With a snap series of commands, you keep your allies in formation and well defended as you assault your adversary.
Hold the Line.effect: Until the end of your next turn, allies gain both a +2 power bonus to AC and cannot be pulled, pushed, or slid while adjacent to you.

Lead the Attack.name: Lead the Attack
Lead the Attack.flavor: Under your direction, arrows hit their marks and blades drive home.
Lead the Attack.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain a power bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.
Lead the Attack.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Furious Smash.name: Furious Smash
Furious Smash.flavor: You deliver a smashing blow to a foe that gets its attention more than harms it, encouraging an ally to hit the enemy where it hurts.
Furious Smash.onHit: Strength modifier damage. Choose an ally adjacent to you or to the target. The ally gains a power bonus to the next attack roll and damage roll that he or she makes against the target before the end of his or her next turn. The power bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

Pin the Foe.name: Pin the Foe
Pin the Foe.flavor: Your attack positions your enemy so that no matter where it turns, one of your allies is waiting.
Pin the Foe.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target cannot shift if at least two of your allies (or you and one ally) are adjacent to it.

Surround Foe.name: Surround Foe
Surround Foe.flavor: You contain your foe, enabling one of your allies to move behind it.
Surround Foe.effect: You slide one ally adjacent to the target up to 5 squares to another square adjacent to the target. You can slide the ally through the target's space.

Beat Them Into the Ground.name: Beat Them Into the Ground
Beat Them Into the Ground.flavor: You sweep the legs out from under your adversary and knock it to the ground with a mighty overhead swing. Your allies, inspired by the sight, follow suit.
Beat Them Into the Ground.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target falls prone. In addition, each ally within 5 squares of you can take a free action to make a basic attack. If that attack hits, its target takes no damage, but falls prone.
Beat Them Into the Ground.tacticalPresence: Each ally gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Wolf Pack Tactics.name: Wolf Pack Tactics
Wolf Pack Tactics.flavor: You attack your enemy with a well-placed blow, allowing a comrade to get into better position.
Wolf Pack Tactics.special: Before the attack, an ally adjacent to you or to the target can shift 1 square as a free action.
Wolf Pack Tactics.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Commander’s Strike.name: Commander’s Strike
Commander’s Strike.flavor: With a shout, you command an ally to attack.
Commander’s Strike.effect: One of your allies can take a free action to make a melee basic attack against the target. The ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Viper’s Strike.name: Viper’s Strike
Viper’s Strike.flavor: You trick your adversary into making a tactical error that gives your comrade a chance to strike.
Viper’s Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Viper’s Strike.effect: If the target shifts before the start of your next turn, it provokes an opportunity attack from an ally of your choice.

Guarding Attack.name: Guarding Attack
Guarding Attack.flavor: With a calculated strike, you knock your enemy off balance, granting a comrade some protection against the villain’s attacks.
Guarding Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally adjacent to you or to the target gains a +2 power bonus to AC against the target’s attacks. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.
Guarding Attack.inspiringPresence: The bonus equals 1 + your Charisma modifier.

Warlord's Strike.name: Warlord's Strike
Warlord's Strike.flavor: One convincing strike is all you need to expose the enemy’s weakness and spur your allies into finishing it off.
Warlord's Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, each of your allies gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls against the target.
Warlord's Strike.inspiringPresence: The bonus equals 1 + your Charisma modifier.

Warlord's Favor.name: Warlord's Favor
Warlord's Favor.flavor: With a calculated blow, you leave your enemy exposed to a comrade’s attack.
Warlord's Favor.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
Warlord's Favor.tacticalPresence: The bonus equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Sunder Armor.name: Sunder Armor
Sunder Armor.flavor: You probe the defenses of your foe until you can land a blow that momentarily leaves it susceptible to other attacks.
Sunder Armor.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies can score a critical hit against the target on a roll of 18–20.

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.flavor: As you attack amid the chaos of battle, you take an opportunity to direct an ally to attack a distracted foe.
Surprise Attack.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally within 5 squares of you can take a free action to make a basic attack with combat advantage against a creature of his or her choice.
Surprise Attack.tacticalPresence: The ally gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Lion's Roar.name: Lion's Roar
Lion's Roar.flavor: With a bloodcurdling roar, you attack your foe, breaking through its defenses. The ferocity of the attack reinvigorates you or an ally in need.
Lion's Roar.effect: You or one ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge.
Lion's Roar.inspiringPresence: If an ally spends the healing surge, he or she gains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Denying Smite.name: Denying Smite
Denying Smite.flavor: No matter how your enemy maneuvers, something comes between it and its quarry—and that something is you.
Denying Smite.effect: Choose one ally within 5 squares of you. The target cannot attack that ally with melee or ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.

Warlord’s Gambit.name: Warlord’s Gambit
Warlord’s Gambit.flavor: You provoke your adversary with a bold stroke. Each time it lunges at you, it recklessly sets up your forces for victory.
Warlord’s Gambit.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls against you, and whenever it attacks you, choose an ally within a number of squares of you equal to your Intelligence modifier. That ally can make a basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

Battle On.name: Battle On
Battle On.flavor: You rally your forces with a battle cry and a calculated blow against the enemy.
Battle On.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.
Battle On.inspiringPresence: Each ally gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier.

Make Them Bleed.name: Make Them Bleed
Make Them Bleed.flavor: You bleed your foe with a wicked strike, exposing a fatal flaw in its armor.
Make Them Bleed.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Make Them Bleed.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you or an ally hits the target, it takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Thunderous Fury.name: Thunderous Fury
Thunderous Fury.flavor: You strike your enemy with a furious blow that creates a momentary lull in the fighting, giving you a chance to direct your allies to victory.
Thunderous Fury.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Thunderous Fury.tacticalPresence: Until the end of your next turn, each of your allies gains a power bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Great Dragon War Cry.name: Great Dragon War Cry
Great Dragon War Cry.flavor: You shout a terrifying battle cry as you attack, driving a wedge of doubt into your foe’s mind. Your comrades, sensing the enemy’s will breaking, redouble their efforts.
Great Dragon War Cry.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Great Dragon War Cry.inspiringPresence: Until the end of the encounter, your allies gain a power bonus to attack rolls against weakened enemies. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

Sudden Assault.name: Sudden Assault
Sudden Assault.flavor: Your quick, slashing blow against your enemy spurs an ally into action.
Sudden Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you can take a standard action as a free action.
Sudden Assault.tacticalPresence: The ally gains a power bonus to attack rolls against creatures adjacent to you. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier and applies only to attack rolls made using the standard action granted by this power.

Warlord's Doom.name: Warlord's Doom
Warlord's Doom.flavor: You break your adversary’s resolve with a ferocious strike.
Warlord's Doom.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can choose an effect on the target that a save can end. The target fails its next saving throw against that effect.

Defensive Rally.name: Defensive Rally
Defensive Rally.flavor: You address your comrades with instructions to help them prevail.
Defensive Rally.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge and make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. In addition, each target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Knock Them Down.name: Knock Them Down
Knock Them Down.flavor: Seeing a weakness among your foes’ defenses, you deliver a low, sweeping blow that knocks your enemy off its feet. Your allies follow your lead.
Knock Them Down.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target falls prone. In addition, each ally within 10 squares of you can take a free action to move up to 3 squares and make a melee basic attack. If that attack hits, its target takes no damage, but falls prone.
Knock Them Down.onMiss: Half damage, and the target falls prone.

White Raven Strike.name: White Raven Strike
White Raven Strike.flavor: You land a punishing blow that ignites the fire within your allies and keeps them alive on the battlefield.
White Raven Strike.effect: Up to two allies within 10 squares of you gain 15 temporary hit points apiece. If you reduce the target to 0 hit points with this attack, the allies gain additional temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Victory Surge.name: Victory Surge
Victory Surge.flavor: With a triumphant roar, you urge your allies to seize every opportunity and fight like never before.
Victory Surge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, each ally within 10 squares of you can follow up a standard action with a basic attack made as a free action.
Victory Surge.onMiss: Until the start of your next turn, one ally within 10 squares of you can follow up a standard action with a basic attack made as a free action.
Victory Surge.sustainMinor: Until the start of your next turn, one ally within 10 squares of you can follow up a standard action with a basic attack made as a free action.

Exhorted Counterattack.name: Exhorted Counterattack
Exhorted Counterattack.flavor: You shout a warning to a comrade under fire, who avoids the brunt of the attack and responds with a vicious counterattack.
Exhorted Counterattack.trigger: An ally within 20 squares of you is hit by an enemy
Exhorted Counterattack.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Exhorted Counterattack.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge and then makes two basic attacks against the attacking enemy as an opportunity action. If either basic attack hits, the enemy is dazed (save ends).
Exhorted Counterattack.inspiringPresence: The ally regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier and gains a bonus to the damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

White Raven’s Call.name: White Raven’s Call
White Raven’s Call.flavor: You release a deluge of brutal attacks upon your foe while calling out to your allies to stand their ground and shake off their weariness.
White Raven’s Call.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and each ally within 10 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
White Raven’s Call.onMiss: Each of your allies within 10 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that the target caused and that a save can end.

Relentless Assault.name: Relentless Assault
Relentless Assault.flavor: You deliver a punishing strike that leaves your foe reeling. Your allies can see its distress and are inspired to greater heights of battle fury.
Relentless Assault.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you or an ally scores a critical hit, you and each ally can make a basic attack as an opportunity action.

Defy Death.name: Defy Death
Defy Death.flavor: You leap to your ally’s side, sparing your comrade from the jaws of death.
Defy Death.effect: The ally can spend a healing surge immediately after the target's attack.
Defy Death.onHit: 7[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target’s attack misses the ally.
Defy Death.onMiss: Half damage, and the target’s attack deals only half damage if it hits the ally.

Stand Invincible.name: Stand Invincible
Stand Invincible.flavor: You throw everything you have at your enemy, delivering a punishing blow to your foe and showing your allies that together you stand invincible.
Stand Invincible.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain resist 5 to all damage and a +4 power bonus to all defenses.
Stand Invincible.sustainMinor: The benefits persist until the end of your next turn.

Shake It Off.name: Shake It Off
Shake It Off.flavor: You offer strong words of encouragement to offset a debilitating effect.
Shake It Off.effect: The target makes a saving throw with a power bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.

Aid the Injured.name: Aid the Injured
Aid the Injured.flavor: Your presence is both a comfort and an inspiration to an ally.
Aid the Injured.effect: The target can spend a healing surge.

Knight's Move.name: Knight's Move
Knight's Move.flavor: With a sharp wave of your arm, you direct one of your allies to a more tactically advantageous position.
Knight's Move.effect: The target can take a move action as a free action.

Stand Tough.name: Stand Tough
Stand Tough.flavor: You fortify your allies with a few words of encouragement.
Stand Tough.targets: You and each ally in the burst
Stand Tough.effect: Each target regains hit points equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier.

Guide the Charge.name: Guide the Charge
Guide the Charge.flavor: You direct your ally’s charge, allowing him or her to strike a deadly blow that pushes the foe backward.
Guide the Charge.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you charges a creature.
Guide the Charge.effect: If the charge attack hits, the target gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier, and he or she pushes the charged creature up to 2 squares. The target can then shift up to 2 squares to a square adjacent to the creature.

Quick Step.name: Quick Step
Quick Step.flavor: You spur an ally to move faster.
Quick Step.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.

Tactical Shift.name: Tactical Shift
Tactical Shift.flavor: Your mastery of battle tactics and stern commands allow you to move an ally out of harm’s way.
Tactical Shift.trigger: An ally is hit by a melee or a ranged attack
Tactical Shift.effect: The ally can take a free action to shift a number of squares up to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Ease Suffering.name: Ease Suffering
Ease Suffering.flavor: Your nearby presence is enough to soften the plight of your allies.
Ease Suffering.effect: Until the end of the encounter, allies ignore ongoing damage on any turn they start adjacent to you, neither taking the damage nor making saving throws to end it.

White Raven Formation.name: White Raven Formation
White Raven Formation.flavor: You forego attacks to focus on redirecting your allies’ positioning.
White Raven Formation.effect: Each target can take a move action as a free action.

Warlord’s Banner.name: Warlord’s Banner
Warlord’s Banner.flavor: You rally your comrades before sending them into battle.
Warlord’s Banner.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge. Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls.

Hero's Defiance.name: Hero's Defiance
Hero's Defiance.flavor: You fight off an adverse condition or enable an ally to do the same.
Hero's Defiance.effect: The target can end one effect on it that a save can end.

Heroic Surge.name: Heroic Surge
Heroic Surge.flavor: The sight of one of your allies being harmed fills you with resolve and compassion, and you turn that dark moment into a heroic surge toward triumph.
Heroic Surge.trigger: You or an ally within 5 squares of you takes damage.
Heroic Surge.target: You and each ally in the burst
Heroic Surge.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Heart of the Titan.name: Heart of the Titan
Heart of the Titan.flavor: With great words of encouragement about glorious victory, you turn yourself or an ally into a battle-hardened juggernaut.
Heart of the Titan.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value + your Charisma modifier. Until the target loses as many temporary hit points as he or she gained from this power, the target gains a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier and can’t be dazed, immobilized, pulled, pushed, restrained, slid, slowed, stunned, or weakened.

Crescendo of Violence.name: Crescendo of Violence
Crescendo of Violence.flavor: When one of your allies delivers a telling blow on a foe, you offer encouragement to help your friend finish the fight.
Crescendo of Violence.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you scores a critical hit.
Crescendo of Violence.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Hammer and Anvil.name: Hammer and Anvil
Hammer and Anvil.flavor: You land a ringing blow against your foe, inspiring a nearby ally to do the same, but harder.
Hammer and Anvil.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action, with a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Steel Monsoon.name: Steel Monsoon
Steel Monsoon.flavor: You leap into the fray with a wild, whirling attack, but your movements are carefully calculated to distract nearby enemies and give your allies a chance to move into position.
Steel Monsoon.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.
Steel Monsoon.tacticalPresence: The number of allies who can shift equals your Intelligence modifier.

Villain’s Nightmare.name: Villain’s Nightmare
Villain’s Nightmare.flavor: You use weapon thrusts, lunges, and parries to hedge in your adversary, preventing it from moving away from you.
Villain’s Nightmare.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you are adjacent to the target and it walks or runs, you can cancel that movement as an immediate interrupt.

Leaf on the Wind.name: Leaf on the Wind
Leaf on the Wind.flavor: As if your enemy were a leaf caught in the autumn wind, your attack maneuvers it as you wish, forcing it to yield ground to one of your allies.
Leaf on the Wind.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You (only if you are adjacent to the target) or one ally adjacent to the target can take a free action to swap places with it, sliding it 1 square and shifting 1 square.

Inspiring War Cry.name: Inspiring War Cry
Inspiring War Cry.flavor: As you strike, you shout a fierce war cry that heartens a nearby ally, jolting your friend out of succumbing to his or her troubles.
Inspiring War Cry.effect: One ally who can hear you and is within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Fury of the Sirocco.name: Fury of the Sirocco
Fury of the Sirocco.flavor: The sirocco drives the desert sands in a thousand directions. So too does your furious attack scatter your enemies and drive them where you want them to go.
Fury of the Sirocco.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Fury of the Sirocco.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.

Bolstering Blow.name: Bolstering Blow
Bolstering Blow.flavor: Your overwhelming attack against your enemy inspires a nearby ally to continue the fight.
Bolstering Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains 10 temporary hit points.
Bolstering Blow.inspiringPresence: The temporary hit points equal 10 + your Charisma modifier.

Hail of Steel.name: Hail of Steel
Hail of Steel.flavor: You deliver a well-placed strike against your foe and call your comrades to do the same. They pelt the enemy with attacks.
Hail of Steel.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a basic attack against the target as a free action.

Warlord’s Rush.name: Warlord’s Rush
Warlord’s Rush.flavor: Like a wild, terrible storm, you hurl yourself at your foe. Your allies are swept along by the force of your wrath.
Warlord’s Rush.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally who can see you can move up to his or her speed as a free action.
Warlord’s Rush.onMiss: One ally who can see you can move up to his or her speed as a free action.

Rabbits and Wolves.name: Rabbits and Wolves
Rabbits and Wolves.flavor: Between swings and parries, you direct beleaguered allies to safety while calling in assistance from across the field.
Rabbits and Wolves.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. Choose one or two allies within 10 squares of you. Each of those allies can shift up to his or her speed as a free action.

Chimera Battlestrike.name: Chimera Battlestrike
Chimera Battlestrike.flavor: With a roaring battle cry, you strike nearby foes and thrust them back, changing the complexion of the battlefield.
Chimera Battlestrike.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Chimera Battlestrike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 2 squares.
Chimera Battlestrike.tacticalPresence: The distance of the slide is up to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Incite Heroism.name: Incite Heroism
Incite Heroism.flavor: You deliver a great blow to your enemy and usher your allies ever closer toward victory. Your words and deeds raise their spirits and inspire them to new acts of heroism.
Incite Heroism.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally you can see gains 20 temporary hit points.
Incite Heroism.inspiringPresence: Each of the allies gains additional temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Devastating Charge.name: Devastating Charge
Devastating Charge.flavor: You rush forward and furiously assault your enemy, encouraging all who see your courage to do the same.
Devastating Charge.effect: You charge and make the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.
Devastating Charge.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, if any ally can see you when he or she charges, the ally gains a bonus to the damage roll of the charge attack. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

Renew the Troops.name: Renew the Troops
Renew the Troops.flavor: Seeing your enemy quail before your onslaught gives your allies the courage to fight on.
Renew the Troops.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Each ally who can see you regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value + your Charisma modifier.
Renew the Troops.onMiss: Each ally who can see you regains hit points equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier.

White Raven Onslaught.name: White Raven Onslaught
White Raven Onslaught.flavor: You deliver a slashing blow, moving your foe as you wish about the battlefield and showing your comrades how to take advantage of your enemy’s poor positioning.
White Raven Onslaught.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can slide an ally adjacent to you 1 square. Until the end of the encounter, immediately after you or an ally within 10 squares of you hits with an attack, that attacker can slide an ally adjacent to him or her 1 square.
White Raven Onslaught.onMiss: Choose an ally within 10 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, immediately after the ally hits with an attack, he or she can slide an ally adjacent to him or her 1 square.

Turning Point.name: Turning Point
Turning Point.flavor: A well-placed strike catches your foe off guard and allows you or a nearby ally to shake off a hindering effect.
Turning Point.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You or one ally within 5 squares makes a saving throw.
Turning Point.onMiss: You or one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that the target caused and that a save can end.

Stand the Fallen.name: Stand the Fallen
Stand the Fallen.flavor: You make a powerful strike against your enemy and call to your comrades, lifting their spirits and restoring their battle lust.
Stand the Fallen.effect: Each ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge and regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Break the Tempo.name: Break the Tempo
Break the Tempo.flavor: You deliver a punishing blow to your foe and then watch how it reacts, striking again when it leaves itself open and throwing it off balance.
Break the Tempo.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can use an immediate interrupt to move up to 4 squares and make a melee basic attack against the target if it makes an attack roll. If you deal damage, the target takes a penalty to its attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Break the Tempo.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Inspiring Word.name: Inspiring Word
Inspiring Word.flavor: You call out to a wounded ally and offer inspiring words of courage and determination that invigorates your comrade.
Inspiring Word.range: Close burst 5 (10 at 11th level, 15 at 21st level)
Inspiring Word.target: You or one ally in the burst
Inspiring Word.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain 1d6 additional hit points.
    Level 6: 2d6 additional hit points.
    Level 11: 3d6 additional hit points.
    Level 16: 4d6 additional hit points.
    Level 21: 5d6 additional hit points.
    Level 26: 6d6 additional hit points.
Inspiring Word.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter.

Windmill of Doom.name: Windmill of Doom
Windmill of Doom.flavor: You cleverly maneuver your adversary into a perfect flanking position. As you land the deciding blow, your surrounding allies strike hard from all sides.
Windmill of Doom.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally of yours adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.
Windmill of Doom.onMiss: One ally of your choice adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.

Own the Battlefield.name: Own the Battlefield
Own the Battlefield.flavor: Like a puppet master, you position your enemies exactly where you want them.
Own the Battlefield.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Own the Battlefield.effect: You slide the target a number of squares up to your Intelligence modifier, but not into hindering terrain.

Pillar to Post.name: Pillar to Post
Pillar to Post.flavor: You strike your foe and send it stumbling into a waiting ally, who drives the foe back toward you.
Pillar to Post.target: One creature flanked by you and an ally
Pillar to Post.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action. If the ally’s attack hits, you make the secondary attack against the target.

Follow Me In.name: Follow Me In
Follow Me In.flavor: You rush into battle with a decisive attack, rallying a friend behind you.
Follow Me In.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 10 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.
Follow Me In.tacticalPresence: If the ally charges while the bonus to speed is in effect, the ally’s movement during the charge does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Follow Me In.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Hammer Formation.name: Hammer Formation
Hammer Formation.flavor: You signal your allies to attack with abandon, dishing out as much damage as possible.
Hammer Formation.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy thrown weapon.
Hammer Formation.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally adjacent to you deals 1[W] extra damage on a hit with the next weapon attack he or she makes before the start of your next turn.
Hammer Formation.resourcefulPresence: Each ally within a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier can deal the extra damage.

Bloody Ending.name: Bloody Ending
Bloody Ending.flavor: You cunningly aim to finish off a wounded foe.
Bloody Ending.resourcefulPresence: Your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the enemy until the end of your next turn.

Stirring Force.name: Stirring Force
Stirring Force.flavor: With a mighty strike, you spur your friends to shake off their hindrances.
Stirring Force.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and any ally within 2 squares of you can make a saving throw.
Stirring Force.resourcefulPresence: Your allies gain a power bonus to the saving throws equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Phalanx Assault.name: Phalanx Assault
Phalanx Assault.flavor: From behind your ready shield, you pound your foe and bark an order, calling for defensive tactics.
Phalanx Assault.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Phalanx Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and allies adjacent to you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.
Phalanx Assault.resourcefulPresence: Adjacent allies gain the +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex even if you miss.

Befuddling Cry.name: Befuddling Cry
Befuddling Cry.flavor: Your warning shout allows your ally to turn an opening into an advantage.
Befuddling Cry.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits an ally with an opportunity attack
Befuddling Cry.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Befuddling Cry.effect: The target makes a melee basic attack against the attacking enemy as a free action. If this attack hits, the attacking enemy rerolls the opportunity attack against a different creature of your choice within its reach.
Befuddling Cry.resourcefulPresence: The enemy gains a bonus to the new attack and damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

Grim Mark.name: Grim Mark
Grim Mark.flavor: Your sidling approach belies your excruciating follow-up, which opens your opponent to attacks from your allies.
Grim Mark.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 2 squares.
Grim Mark.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and marked until the end of your next turn.
Grim Mark.resourcefulPresence: While the target is marked by this power, your allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Charisma modifier.

Withdrawal Gambit.name: Withdrawal Gambit
Withdrawal Gambit.flavor: With an interposing attack, you give your companions the determination and the space to improve the tactical situation.
Withdrawal Gambit.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each of your allies adjacent to the target can make a saving throw and then shift 1 square as a free action.
Withdrawal Gambit.tacticalPresence: Each ally gains a power bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier, and each can instead shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Girding Strike.name: Girding Strike
Girding Strike.flavor: You smite your enemy as you shout encouragement to your allies, imparting the vigor they need to push on.
Girding Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally within 10 squares of you regains the use of second wind.
Girding Strike.resourcefulPresence: Any ally who uses second wind before the end of your next turn regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Bloody Termination.name: Bloody Termination
Bloody Termination.flavor: Your adversary reels from wounds, and you mean to bring that torment to an end.
Bloody Termination.resourcefulPresence: If the attack’s damage doesn’t reduce the target to 0 hit points, make a melee basic attack against the target, with a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Blood Begets Blood.name: Blood Begets Blood
Blood Begets Blood.flavor: With a brutal strike and a marshalling cry, you open your enemy’s defenses. Your allies respond with a coordinated assault.
Blood Begets Blood.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is bloodied or reduced to 0 hit points by this attack, two allies within 5 squares of you can each make a basic attack as a free action.
Blood Begets Blood.resourcefulPresence: If the target is bloodied or reduced to 0 hit points by this attack, three allies within 5 squares of you can each make a basic attack as a free action.

Quickening Force.name: Quickening Force
Quickening Force.flavor: The punishing blow you land on your enemy causes your allies to take heart and defy ill fortune.
Quickening Force.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.
Quickening Force.resourcefulPresence: Your allies gain a power bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier.

Wounding Focus.name: Wounding Focus
Wounding Focus.flavor: You open a small wound on your foe as a pinpoint target for your allies.
Wounding Focus.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, your allies gain combat advantage against the target and a power bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm.flavor: With a gale of fierce swings, you give your enemies cause to consider you dangerous and your allies cause for hope.
Eye of the Storm.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Eye of the Storm.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Eye of the Storm.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any of your allies who hit enemies marked by this power can use a free action either to make a saving throw or to spend a healing surge.
Eye of the Storm.resourcefulPresence: If an ally makes the saving throw, he or she gains a power bonus to the roll equal to your Intelligence modifier. If an ally spends the healing surge, he or she regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Myrmidon Formation.name: Myrmidon Formation
Myrmidon Formation.flavor: Knowing that regrouping increases morale, you attack while calling for your allies to fall into line.
Myrmidon Formation.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Myrmidon Formation.effect: At the start of your next turn, each ally adjacent to you gains 5 temporary hit points.

Blood Designation.name: Blood Designation
Blood Designation.flavor: The blood you’ ve drawn acts as a target for your comrades.
Blood Designation.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). As long as the ongoing damage persists, your allies gain combat advantage against the target.
Blood Designation.inspiringPresence: Add your Charisma modifier to the ongoing damage.

A Rock and a Hard Place.name: A Rock and a Hard Place
A Rock and a Hard Place.flavor: You focus to work in concert with your companion, harrying your opponent with relentless blows.
A Rock and a Hard Place.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy adjacent to you attacks an ally of yours and misses, you deal damage to the enemy equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free action.
A Rock and a Hard Place.tacticalPresence: If the enemy is marked by an ally, deal 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage instead.

Anticipate Attack (Warlord).name: Anticipate Attack (Warlord)
Anticipate Attack (Warlord).flavor: Maneuvering to make your enemy open itself up to attack, you deliver a passing blow. Your comrades follow up with strikes of their own.
Anticipate Attack (Warlord).trigger: An adjacent enemy hits you with a melee attack
Anticipate Attack (Warlord).onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square.
Anticipate Attack (Warlord).effect: Each ally adjacent to the target can make an opportunity attack against it and has combat advantage for the attack.
Anticipate Attack (Warlord).tacticalPresence: Each ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Scent of Victory.name: Scent of Victory
Scent of Victory.flavor: As your enemies stagger from their wounds, you can smell victory. Your allies respond with a furious assault.
Scent of Victory.special: Each target can make a melee basic attack as a free action against a bloodied enemy adjacent to him or her.

Reckless Opportunity.name: Reckless Opportunity
Reckless Opportunity.flavor: You hurl an impulsive command at an ally, hoping that he understands it properly.
Reckless Opportunity.targets: One enemy in the burst and you or one ally in the burst
Reckless Opportunity.effect: The targets make opposed initiative checks. The winner gains combat advantage against the loser until the end of the winner’s next turn.
Reckless Opportunity.bravuraPresence: You or your ally gains a power bonus to the initiative check equal to your Charisma modifier.

Tempting Target.name: Tempting Target
Tempting Target.flavor: You invite attack and distract your foes in the process.
Tempting Target.effect: Until the stance ends, you grant combat advantage to all enemies, but any enemies adjacent to you grant combat advantage to your allies.
Tempting Target.bravuraPresence: When an enemy adjacent to you becomes bloodied or is reduced to 0 hit points, you regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Staggering Spin.name: Staggering Spin
Staggering Spin.flavor: With a wild, wheeling attack, you send your foes careening into your allies’ waiting weapons.
Staggering Spin.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. If the target is then adjacent to any of your allies, those allies can make a melee basic attack against the target as an opportunity action.

Arkhosia’s Fury.name: Arkhosia’s Fury
Arkhosia’s Fury.flavor: In a traditional dragonborn maneuver, you storm in, smite an enemy, spin away, and punish yet another foe.
Arkhosia’s Fury.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 2 squares.
Arkhosia’s Fury.onMiss: Half damage, and you can shift 1 square.
Arkhosia’s Fury.effect: After you shift, you can make a basic attack against a different target.
Arkhosia’s Fury.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Shielding Retaliation.name: Shielding Retaliation
Shielding Retaliation.flavor: You step in front of an attack meant for your ally and give the attacker a staggering blow. Your friend can then move to a better position.
Shielding Retaliation.trigger: An adjacent enemy hits an ally with an opportunity attack
Shielding Retaliation.effect: The opportunity attack hits you instead.
Shielding Retaliation.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the ally can shift 2 squares.

Flattening Charge.name: Flattening Charge
Flattening Charge.flavor: The force of your hurtling attack knocks your enemy flat or leaves your defenses down.
Flattening Charge.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Flattening Charge.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Flattening Charge.bravuraPresence: If the attack hits, this power is not expended.
Flattening Charge.onMiss: The target gains combat advantage against you until the start of your next turn.

Unified in Blood.name: Unified in Blood
Unified in Blood.flavor: Rushing to defend a friend in trouble, you make a bold attack. Your friend then defends himself by your example.
Unified in Blood.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you bloodies an ally
Unified in Blood.effect: Before the attack, you can move your speed.
Unified in Blood.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the bloodied ally can make a basic attack against the target as a free action.

Infectious Determination.name: Infectious Determination
Infectious Determination.flavor: With each strike you deliver, your allies gain more resolve to grab victory from the jaws of defeat.
Infectious Determination.effect: As a free action, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Infectious Determination.resourcefulPresence: Each ally adds your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained.
Infectious Determination.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Each ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge as a free action.

Precision Stance.name: Precision Stance
Precision Stance.flavor: You take on a watchful bearing, lending your allies your battle acumen, allowing their wilder strikes to hit home more often.
Precision Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, when an ally within 5 squares of you misses with an attack, you can take an immediate interrupt to allow the ally to reroll the attack roll with a bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Repositioning Command.name: Repositioning Command
Repositioning Command.flavor: With a single word from you, your allies shift to more advantageous positions.
Repositioning Command.targets: You and each ally in the burst

Deadly Returns.name: Deadly Returns
Deadly Returns.flavor: You create an opening that allows an ally to capitalize on your foe’s aggression.
Deadly Returns.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you choose one ally within 5 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, if the target makes a melee attack against you or the ally, the ally can make an opportunity attack against the target.

Unintended Feint.name: Unintended Feint
Unintended Feint.flavor: As your ally misses, you spot an opening that the attack created. You point it out so that your friend can immediately take advantage of it.
Unintended Feint.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you misses with an attack
Unintended Feint.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Unintended Feint.effect: The target can reroll the attack and has combat advantage for it.

Marked Revelation.name: Marked Revelation
Marked Revelation.flavor: With a fake command and your ally’s practiced response, you identify that ally as a danger that your enemies should heed.
Marked Revelation.target: Each unmarked enemy in the burst
Marked Revelation.effect: The targets are marked by an ally of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Flawless Snare.name: Flawless Snare
Flawless Snare.flavor: With a practiced swing, you throw yourself off balance, making yourself into bait and your allies the waiting trap.
Flawless Snare.effect: You mark the target and grant combat advantage to it until the end of your next turn. Whenever the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, each ally within 10 squares of you can make a basic attack against it as an opportunity action triggered by its attack.
Flawless Snare.bravuraPresence: Each ally gains a bonus to the basic attack’s attack roll and damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Flawless Snare.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Flanking Stance.name: Flanking Stance
Flanking Stance.flavor: You take up a vulnerable position that forces your enemies into disadvantageous positions as well.
Flanking Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy adjacent to you gains combat advantage against you but grants combat advantage to your allies.
Flanking Stance.bravuraPresence: Allies gain a bonus to melee damage rolls against enemies adjacent to you equal to your Charisma modifier.

Decisive Timing.name: Decisive Timing
Decisive Timing.flavor: Practice has honed your party’s maneuvering to near perfection.
Decisive Timing.trigger: You and your allies make initiative checks at the beginning of an encounter
Decisive Timing.targets: You and two allies in the burst or three allies in the burst
Decisive Timing.effect: You swap the initiative check results of the targets.
Decisive Timing.tacticalPresence: Until the end of his or her first turn in the encounter, the target with the lowest initiative result gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Shutdown Smite.name: Shutdown Smite
Shutdown Smite.flavor: A well-placed attack throws your foe out of prime fighting form for a moment.
Shutdown Smite.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target cannot recharge any of its powers or use action points until the end of your next turn.
Shutdown Smite.tacticalPresence: The target also takes a penalty to saving throws equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.

Ringing Clarity.name: Ringing Clarity
Ringing Clarity.flavor: The clang of your steel on your enemy’s armor clears the cobwebs from your allies’ heads.
Ringing Clarity.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the marked condition ends on any ally within 10 squares of you. Also, each ally within 10 squares of you automatically saves against a charm or a fear effect that a save can end.

Perfect Front.name: Perfect Front
Perfect Front.flavor: With practiced form, you and your allies create a battle line that allows you to attack with godlike precision.
Perfect Front.effect: Until the stance ends, as long as you are adjacent to an ally, roll twice each time you make an attack roll and use the higher result. Any ally adjacent to you gains the same benefit.
Perfect Front.tacticalPresence: You gain the benefit when within 2 squares of an ally, and an ally within 2 squares of you gains the benefit as well.

Denying Mark.name: Denying Mark
Denying Mark.flavor: Your smite incites your enemy to focus on you, but only with weaker attacks.
Denying Mark.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked (save ends).
Denying Mark.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is marked until the end of its next turn.
Denying Mark.effect: The target cannot recharge its powers as long as it is marked by this power.
Denying Mark.bravuraPresence: The target also cannot spend action points as long as it is marked by this power.

Disheartening Flurry.name: Disheartening Flurry
Disheartening Flurry.flavor: The skill you show with your series of attacks dismays your enemies.
Disheartening Flurry.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Disheartening Flurry.effect: The target takes a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of the encounter.

Driving Volley.name: Driving Volley
Driving Volley.flavor: You send multiple shots flying at your enemies. Each missile drives a foe back toward your allies, who seize the opportunity to attack.
Driving Volley.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier. If the target ends the push adjacent to one of your allies, that ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as an opportunity action.

Inspiring Reaction.name: Inspiring Reaction
Inspiring Reaction.flavor: As soon as an ally is wounded, you spring forward to keep your friend standing.
Inspiring Reaction.trigger: You or an ally adjacent to you takes damage.
Inspiring Reaction.target: The character who takes the damage
Inspiring Reaction.effect: The target can spend a healing surge and regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Brash Assault.name: Brash Assault
Brash Assault.flavor: Your bold lunge leaves you open to an enemy’s counterattack, but that’s just what you want.
Brash Assault.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
Brash Assault.effect: The target can make a melee basic attack against you as a free action and has combat advantage for the attack. If the target makes this attack, an ally of your choice within 5 squares of the target can make a basic attack against the target as a free action and has combat advantage for the attack.

Opening Shove.name: Opening Shove
Opening Shove.flavor: You knock your foe off-balance while shouting a quick command to an ally.
Opening Shove.onHit: You push the target 1 square. Then choose one ally you can see. That ally either shifts a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or makes a melee basic attack against the target.

Luring Focus.name: Luring Focus
Luring Focus.flavor: Your attack wounds your adversary, and another enemy moves closer, hoping to take advantage of your concentration.
Luring Focus.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Choose another enemy within 5 squares of you and pull it 1 square.
Luring Focus.bravuraPresence: Pull the enemy a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Luring Focus.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Nimble Footwork.name: Nimble Footwork
Nimble Footwork.flavor: You attack and step to one side, allowing an ally to slip closer.
Nimble Footwork.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. After you shift, one ally within 2 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Calculated Assault.name: Calculated Assault
Calculated Assault.flavor: Your attack proves your superior command of the situation.
Calculated Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one of your allies within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier until the end of the encounter. You can transfer the bonus to another ally within 5 squares of you as a minor action.

Concentrated Attack.name: Concentrated Attack
Concentrated Attack.flavor: You and your companion combine your attacks to deliver a nasty blow.
Concentrated Attack.effect: One ally within 10 squares of you can make a basic attack against the target as a free action. The ally gains a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Fearless Rescue.name: Fearless Rescue
Fearless Rescue.flavor: One of your allies falls, and without regard for your own well-being, you rush to make the attacker pay. Your bravery inspires your ally to fight on.
Fearless Rescue.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you reduces an ally to 0 hit points or fewer
Fearless Rescue.effect: The ally can spend a healing surge and regains an additional 1d6 hit points for every opportunity attack you provoke while moving to the target.

Lead by Example.name: Lead by Example
Lead by Example.flavor: You step forward to attack, showing your allies how it’s done—and whom to hit next.
Lead by Example.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 1 square.
Lead by Example.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and your allies gain combat advantage against the target until the start of your next turn.
Lead by Example.onMiss: Two allies within 5 squares of you can each shift 1 square and make a basic attack as a free action.

Adaptive Stratagem.name: Adaptive Stratagem
Adaptive Stratagem.flavor: Your companion has the ability and the will. You provide the plan and the motivation.
Adaptive Stratagem.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the ally gains his or her choice of a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier or a power bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

Heroic Effort (Warlord).name: Heroic Effort (Warlord)
Heroic Effort (Warlord).flavor: On the brink of exhaustion, you still manage to rally your allies.
Heroic Effort (Warlord).effect: The target can add your Charisma modifier to damage rolls until you are no longer bloodied. Also, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Charisma modifier.

Inspired Belligerence.name: Inspired Belligerence
Inspired Belligerence.flavor: You lead your allies to use your enemies’ defensive openings to deliver more punishment.
Inspired Belligerence.target: One enemy in the burst granting combat advantage to you or an ally
Inspired Belligerence.effect: Until the start of your next turn, all your allies gain combat advantage against the target.
Inspired Belligerence.inspiringPresence: Until the start of your next turn, your allies add your Charisma modifier to damage rolls against the target.

Motivated Recovery.name: Motivated Recovery
Motivated Recovery.flavor: At your encouragement, an injured ally exploits an opportunity to shine.
Motivated Recovery.target: One bloodied ally in the burst
Motivated Recovery.effect: The target regains the use of second wind and gains a power bonus to his or her next attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Rub Some Dirt On It.name: Rub Some Dirt On It
Rub Some Dirt On It.flavor: With a wisecrack, you give your comrade a little courage despite his wounds.
Rub Some Dirt On It.target: You if you’re bloodied or one bloodied ally
Rub Some Dirt On It.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Dicey Predicament.name: Dicey Predicament
Dicey Predicament.flavor: Surrounded by enemies, you fake weakness and make them careless. Then you suddenly strike.
Dicey Predicament.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and all enemies adjacent to you grant combat advantage to all your allies within 5 squares of you until the end of your next turn.
Dicey Predicament.bravuraPresence: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Pike Hedge.name: Pike Hedge
Pike Hedge.flavor: Setting yourself to foil enemy movement, you’re ready to strike anyone who comes near.
Pike Hedge.trigger: An enemy enters a square within your reach
Pike Hedge.requirement: You must be wielding a reach weapon.
Pike Hedge.effect: Whenever an enemy enters a square adjacent to you or to an ally adjacent to you, you deal damage to that enemy equal to your Strength modifier as an opportunity action. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter.

Situational Advantage.name: Situational Advantage
Situational Advantage.flavor: Your attack against an unprepared enemy gives you and your allies a decided advantage.
Situational Advantage.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy thrown weapon.
Situational Advantage.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally within 10 squares of you deal extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier when hitting with combat advantage.
Situational Advantage.resourcefulPresence: Your extra damage is 1[W] + Intelligence modifier instead.

Encouraging Stance.name: Encouraging Stance
Encouraging Stance.flavor: With a daunting bearing, you unleash a litany of oaths as you attack, pushing your allies onward.
Encouraging Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, when you hit with a melee attack, choose a bloodied ally within 5 squares of you. That ally gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.
Encouraging Stance.bravuraPresence: You can choose to grant the temporary hit points when you miss with a melee attack, but that grants the target of the attack combat advantage against you until the end of your next turn.

Forward Observer.name: Forward Observer
Forward Observer.flavor: Discerning the proper angle of fire, you point out concealed enemies to your allies.
Forward Observer.effect: Choose one enemy you can see. Until the end of your next turn, any ally who can see or hear you doesn’t take the normal penalty to attack rolls for cover or concealment when attacking that enemy (the penalties for superior cover and total concealment still apply).

Guileful Switch.name: Guileful Switch
Guileful Switch.flavor: You spring a trap on your opponents, surprising them with your clever stratagem.
Guileful Switch.requirement: You must use this power during your turn before you take any other actions.
Guileful Switch.effect: You and one ally you can see switch places in the initiative order. Your turn ends when you use this power, and the ally takes his or her next turn immediately, even if he or she has already acted during this round. You then act when your ally would have acted.

Phalanx Formation.name: Phalanx Formation
Phalanx Formation.flavor: You and your allies link shields for better defense.
Phalanx Formation.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Phalanx Formation.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you are adjacent to any ally who is using a shield, you and the ally gain a +1 power bonus to AC and Reflex.

Rousing Words.name: Rousing Words
Rousing Words.flavor: As your ally’s spirit wanes, you manage to pick just the right words to inspire him.
Rousing Words.target: You or one ally in the burst
Rousing Words.effect: The target can spend two healing surges.
Rousing Words.inspiringPresence: The target regains additional hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Tactical Supervision.name: Tactical Supervision
Tactical Supervision.flavor: You lend your expertise to your ally to help her strike a foe.
Tactical Supervision.trigger: An ally makes a basic attack, a bull rush, or a charge within 10 squares of you
Tactical Supervision.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Tactical Supervision.effect: The target gains a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Provoke Overextension.name: Provoke Overextension
Provoke Overextension.flavor: You goad the enemy into pressing too far, setting up your ally’s counterstrike.
Provoke Overextension.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target must make a basic attack against you as a free action. If the basic attack misses, an ally of yours can make a basic attack against the target as a free action.
Provoke Overextension.bravuraPresence: You gain a bonus to your AC against the target’s basic attack equal to your Charisma modifier and your ally gains the same bonus to his or her basic attack’s damage roll.

Sacrificial Lure.name: Sacrificial Lure
Sacrificial Lure.flavor: Your wild strike lands solidly and inspires a comrade, but it leaves you vulnerable.
Sacrificial Lure.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, one ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to his or her next attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Sacrificial Lure.effect: You take a –2 penalty to AC until the start of your next turn.

War of Attrition.name: War of Attrition
War of Attrition.flavor: Little by little, your allies turn the tide against the enemy.
War of Attrition.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, any ally who can see you gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls with basic attacks and at-will powers.
War of Attrition.inspiringPresence: The bonus to damage rolls equals your Charisma modifier.

Stay on Target.name: Stay on Target
Stay on Target.flavor: You and your comrades train your fire on an enemy drawing near.
Stay on Target.trigger: An enemy enters a square within 3 squares of you
Stay on Target.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy thrown weapon.
Stay on Target.effect: Each ally within 2 squares of you can make a ranged basic attack against the target as an immediate reaction, with a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Warlord's Recovery.name: Warlord's Recovery
Warlord's Recovery.flavor: You point out an opportunity perfect for an ally’s attacks, renewing your own determination to end this fight.
Warlord's Recovery.effect: As a free action, the target can make an attack using an encounter attack power that he or she has already used during this encounter. Also, if you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a warlord encounter attack power you have used during this encounter.

Bolstering Shout.name: Bolstering Shout
Bolstering Shout.flavor: Your war cry quickly rallies your allies.
Bolstering Shout.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier when he or she uses second wind. Each target can also choose to use second wind as a minor action but gain no bonus to defenses from it.

Instant Planning.name: Instant Planning
Instant Planning.flavor: Your instinctive reactions to the situation turn the tide in your favor
Instant Planning.target: You and each ally in the burst
Instant Planning.effect: Until the end of your next turn, every target gains your choice of a power bonus to  attack rolls equal to your Charisma modifier, a power bonus to speed equal to your Charisma modifier, or a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Instant Planning.resourcefulPresence: You can grant a different bonus to each target.

Rallying Deflection.name: Rallying Deflection
Rallying Deflection.flavor: You catch the arrow on your shield and send your ally forward to meet the shooter.
Rallying Deflection.trigger: An enemy hits you with a ranged attack
Rallying Deflection.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Rallying Deflection.effect: Reduce the attack’s damage by one-half your level. One ally within 5 squares of the attacker can charge the attacker as a free action.

Strider Stance.name: Strider Stance
Strider Stance.flavor: You stand ready to change position quickly or to point out opportunities for your allies to do so.
Strider Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, once on each of your turns you can use a move action to  shift 1 square and gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn, or you can use a move action to allow an ally within 5 squares of you to do the same as a free action.

Headstrong Bravery.name: Headstrong Bravery
Headstrong Bravery.flavor: You smite your enemy without regard for your safety, inciting the enemy against you and your allies against it.
Headstrong Bravery.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn. Until the start of your next turn, you grant combat advantage to all enemies, and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the target.
Headstrong Bravery.bravuraPresence: Your allies instead gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier.
Headstrong Bravery.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Pincer Maneuver.name: Pincer Maneuver
Pincer Maneuver.flavor: At your command, two of your allies move to flank a foe.
Pincer Maneuver.targets: One or two allies in the burst
Pincer Maneuver.effect: Each target can shift 3 squares and make a melee basic attack against an adjacent enemy as a free action. If the target is flanking the enemy, he or she gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Pincer Maneuver.bravuraPresence: The target gains a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Ventured Gains.name: Ventured Gains
Ventured Gains.flavor: Rushing to take your adversary down a notch, you ignore your defenses but allow your allies to take advantageous shots.
Ventured Gains.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If this attack bloodies the target, two of your adjacent allies can each make a basic attack against the target as a free action.
Ventured Gains.bravuraPresence: Each ally gains a power bonus to the basic attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Ventured Gains.effect: You grant combat advantage to all enemies until the start of your next turn.

Formidable Smash.name: Formidable Smash
Formidable Smash.flavor: Your strike leaves your foe hesitant to attack you or anyone near you.
Formidable Smash.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you or any ally who is adjacent to you when it attacks (the target takes no penalty if it is immune to fear).

Grim Instruction.name: Grim Instruction
Grim Instruction.flavor: With a remarkable show of skill, you school your foe, revealing the flaws in its fighting style.
Grim Instruction.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and grants combat advantage to you and your allies (save ends both).

War Master's Assault.name: War Master's Assault
War Master's Assault.flavor: You orchestrate a devastating coordinated attack.
War Master's Assault.targets: You and each ally in the burst
War Master's Assault.effect: Each target can charge or make a basic attack as a free action, with a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Encouraging Remark.name: Encouraging Remark
Encouraging Remark.flavor: You whisper a few words of support to a comrade heading back into the fray.
Encouraging Remark.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier. Until the end of your next turn, the target also gains a power bonus to damage rolls, one defense, or saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

Side by Side.name: Side by Side
Side by Side.flavor: You and an ally form a deadly team, fighting in tandem.
Side by Side.effect: Until the stance ends, you and the target both gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls, AC, and Reflex when you’re adjacent to each other.

Warning Shout.name: Warning Shout
Warning Shout.flavor: Hearing your call of alarm, your friend leaps for cover.
Warning Shout.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by a ranged or an area attack
Warning Shout.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Warning Shout.effect: The target can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Deadly Inspiration.name: Deadly Inspiration
Deadly Inspiration.flavor: Your bold strike inspires your allies to show off their fighting prowess.
Deadly Inspiration.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and allies within 5 squares of you deal 1[W] extra damage with their at-will weapon attacks that hit until the start of your next turn.

Into the Breach!.name: Into the Breach!
Into the Breach!.flavor: You leap forward boldly, shouting a battle cry that fills your allies with the same courage.
Into the Breach!.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you can charge the target as a free action.
Into the Breach!.inspiringPresence: The charging ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Into the Breach!.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Inspiring Charge.name: Inspiring Charge
Inspiring Charge.flavor: Giving your companions a quick signal, you charge forward to glory, inspiring them.
Inspiring Charge.effect: As a free action, each ally within 10 squares of you can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and then spend a healing surge.
Inspiring Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Storm of Carnage.name: Storm of Carnage
Storm of Carnage.flavor: For you and your comrades, every miss is just a new opportunity.
Storm of Carnage.onMiss: Make a melee basic attack against the target.
Storm of Carnage.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time you or an adjacent ally misses with an encounter or a daily melee attack power, that character can make a melee basic attack against the same target as a free action.

Unleash Hell.name: Unleash Hell
Unleash Hell.flavor: On your command, you and your allies unleash a ranged barrage upon your enemies.
Unleash Hell.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy thrown weapon.
Unleash Hell.attack: Strength vs. AC. The attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.
Unleash Hell.effect:
Each ally within 5 squares of you can make a ranged
basic attack against an enemy as a free action, with a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier. Until the end of your next turn, any ranged attack made by you or your allies can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18–20.

Avenge Me.name: Avenge Me
Avenge Me.flavor: As you succumb to your injuries, you shout out a call for retribution.
Avenge Me.trigger: You are reduced to 0 hit points or fewer by an enemy
Avenge Me.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. Until the end of the encounter, the targets gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Bloodthirsty Offensive.name: Bloodthirsty Offensive
Bloodthirsty Offensive.flavor: You have your foes against the wall, and you focus your attention on finishing the job.
Bloodthirsty Offensive.effect: Until the stance ends, you grant combat advantage to all enemies. In addition, you and each ally within 10 squares of you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against bloodied enemies. Also, each time you or an ally within 10 squares of you spends an action point to take an extra action, that character can make a basic attack as a free action before taking the extra action.
Bloodthirsty Offensive.bravuraPresence: You and each ally within 10 squares of you gain a bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies equal to your Charisma modifier.

Quickening Order.name: Quickening Order
Quickening Order.flavor: You aim to win the fight before your foes can respond.
Quickening Order.trigger: You and your allies make initiative checks at the beginning of an encounter
Quickening Order.target: You and each ally in the burst
Quickening Order.effect: Each target gains a power bonus to the initiative check equal to your Intelligence modifier, and during each target’s first turn, he or she gains a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Rush of Battle.name: Rush of Battle
Rush of Battle.flavor: You raise your voice above the din, encouraging your allies to make a rapid series of attacks.
Rush of Battle.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each target can make basic attacks as minor actions.
Rush of Battle.resourcefulPresence: Each target gains a bonus to the basic attack rolls equal to your Intelligence or Charisma modifier.

Stirring Declaration.name: Stirring Declaration
Stirring Declaration.flavor: As you attack, you cheer your friends on toward victory.
Stirring Declaration.requirement: You must be trained in Diplomacy.
Stirring Declaration.effect: Until the stance ends, each time you hit an enemy with an attack, allies within 10 squares of you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier. You and your allies gain a bonus to saving throws against fear effects equal to your Charisma modifier.
Stirring Declaration.inspiringPresence: Each time you hit an enemy with an attack, one ally within 10 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Daring Display.name: Daring Display
Daring Display.flavor: You fling yourself against your enemy brutally, unleashing a fury that draws the eye of nearby enemies.
Daring Display.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark and grant combat advantage to every enemy within 2 squares of you until the end of your next turn. Each of the enemies that attacks you grants combat advantage to your allies until the end of its next turn.
Daring Display.bravuraPresence: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier, and you can shift 1 square, whether or not you hit.

Primordial Onslaught.name: Primordial Onslaught
Primordial Onslaught.flavor: You attack like a force of nature, driving your opponents before you.
Primordial Onslaught.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time you or an ally attacks any target of this power, you can slide the target 1 square after resolving the attack.

Sleeping Dragon Lure.name: Sleeping Dragon Lure
Sleeping Dragon Lure.flavor: You land a light blow to make yourself look weak, and when a foe gives in to temptation and attacks you, you explode in a burst of violence.
Sleeping Dragon Lure.effect: You grant combat advantage to enemies that make melee attacks against you until the start of your next turn. If an enemy hits you with a melee attack while this effect lasts, you can make a secondary attack against the attacker as an immediate interrupt. You can shift 1 square closer to the secondary target before making the secondary attack. If no enemy attacks you in melee before the start of your next turn, you regain the use of this power.
Sleeping Dragon Lure.bravuraPresence: You gain a bonus to the secondary attack’s attack roll and damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Victorious Destiny.name: Victorious Destiny
Victorious Destiny.flavor: Your decisive strike turns the tide of battle as your allies find renewed ferocity.
Victorious Destiny.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage, and allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

Warlord's Resurgence.name: Warlord's Resurgence
Warlord's Resurgence.flavor: With deific speed and precision, you call out an opening for an ally’s attack. You also spot an opportunity that you can later exploit.
Warlord's Resurgence.effect: As a free action, the target can make an attack using an encounter attack power that he or she has already used during this encounter, and the target gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll. Also, if you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a warlord encounter attack power you have used during this encounter.

Wave of Defeat.name: Wave of Defeat
Wave of Defeat.flavor: You and your comrades hurl your foes backward in a furious simultaneous assault.
Wave of Defeat.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Wave of Defeat.effect: Each ally within 5 squares of you can make a melee basic attack as a free action. On a hit, the ally can push his or her target 1 square.

Abrupt Skirmish.name: Abrupt Skirmish
Abrupt Skirmish.flavor: Using feigned weakness or harsh words, you goad your enemies to attack you. Your allies instantly fall upon your foes in turn.
Abrupt Skirmish.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Abrupt Skirmish.effect: You pull each target 1 square to a space adjacent to you. You can’t pull a target that can’t end adjacent to you. You then attack one of the targets.
Abrupt Skirmish.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. Each enemy adjacent to you can make a melee basic attack against you as a free action, but each of your allies can make a basic attack against the enemy as an opportunity action triggered by the enemy’s attack.
Abrupt Skirmish.bravuraPresence: Each ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Brutal Setup.name: Brutal Setup
Brutal Setup.flavor: After a cautious approach, you deliver a wicked smite and your enemy staggers, becoming an obvious target for your friends.
Brutal Setup.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 3 squares.
Brutal Setup.attack: Strength vs. AC, one attack per target
Brutal Setup.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Brutal Setup.tacticalPresence: Until the end of the encounter, your allies gain a power bonus to attack rolls against dazed enemies equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Uplifting Assault.name: Uplifting Assault
Uplifting Assault.flavor: Your successful strike fills you with renewed hope that you can use to inspire your comrades.
Uplifting Assault.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain an additional use of inspiring word for this encounter.
Uplifting Assault.inspiringPresence: Until the start of your next turn, you can use inspiring word as an immediate reaction triggered by an ally taking damage.

Warlord's Indignation.name: Warlord's Indignation
Warlord's Indignation.flavor: An enemy dares to strike you, and you hurl him to the ground in retaliation. Your allies then make him pay for his insolence.
Warlord's Indignation.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Warlord's Indignation.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Each of your allies can then make a basic attack against the target as an opportunity action.

Deific Rallying.name: Deific Rallying
Deific Rallying.flavor: You loose a tremendous shout, giving your allies confidence and instant attacks.
Deific Rallying.effect: Each target gains 20 temporary hit points and can make a basic attack as a free action.
Deific Rallying.inspiringPresence: Each target gains additional temporary hit points and a bonus to the basic attack’s damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Inexorable Surge.name: Inexorable Surge
Inexorable Surge.flavor: You deliver a spectacular attack, filling your allies with lethal resolve against your adversaries.
Inexorable Surge.onHit:
6[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, your allies gain a bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Charisma modifier.
When the target is reduced to 0 hit points, choose another enemy within 5 squares of it, and your allies gain the bonus to damage rolls against that enemy. Each time the chosen enemy is reduced to 0 hit points, choose a different enemy within 5 squares of it.

Wake of Devastation.name: Wake of Devastation
Wake of Devastation.flavor: Your furious weapon thrusts leave many trails of blood.
Wake of Devastation.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
