Wake of Devastation.effect: Each target takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends). Each target taking ongoing damage grants combat advantage to you and your allies.
Wake of Devastation.resourcefulPresence: You can reduce the damage to 1[W] to add 15 to the ongoing damage, or you can increase the damage to 5[W] by forgoing the ongoing damage.

Covering Maneuver.name: Covering Maneuver
Covering Maneuver.flavor: Responding to your expertise, one ally steps in to cover another’s recovery.
Covering Maneuver.trigger: You or an ally within 5 squares of you uses second wind
Covering Maneuver.target: One ally in the burst other than the triggering character
Covering Maneuver.effect: The target can shift 1 square as a free action. In addition, an enemy in the burst is marked by the target until the end of the enemy's next turn.

Diabolic Stratagem.name: Diabolic Stratagem
Diabolic Stratagem.flavor: A feint and attack marks a foe and seemingly leaves you defenseless, but it’s just a cunning move to allow you to make other attacks.
Diabolic Stratagem.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Diabolic Stratagem.effect: You grant the target of this attack combat advantage until the start of your next turn. The first attack the target makes against you before the start of your next turn provokes opportunity attacks from you and your allies.

Polearm Vault.name: Polearm Vault
Polearm Vault.flavor: You fly over the heads of friend or foe with a vault leveraged by your polearm.
Polearm Vault.requirement: You must be wielding a polearm.
Polearm Vault.effect: Move 4 squares, ignoring difficult and hindering terrain. You can use this power to move through an enemy’s space, but doing so provokes opportunity attacks when leaving a square adjacent to the enemy as normal.

Caging Glaive.name: Caging Glaive
Caging Glaive.flavor: You use the advantage of your reach to position your foe and then cage him with a myriad of minor swings.
Caging Glaive.requirement: You must be wielding a reach weapon.
Caging Glaive.effect: Before the attack, slide the target 3 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Caging Glaive.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and your target is slowed and grants combat advantage to all creatures until it starts its turn in a square outside your melee reach.
Caging Glaive.onMiss: Half damage and target is slowed and grants combat advantage to all creatures until the end of your next turn.

Malenbranche's Pull.name: Malenbranche's Pull
Malenbranche's Pull.flavor: The painful stab puts your foe off balance. The follow-up pull has it groveling in pain.
Malenbranche's Pull.requirement: You must be wielding a reach weapon.
Malenbranche's Pull.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and slide the target 3 squares to a space adjacent to you. After the slide, the target is knocked prone.

Kyton's Battledance.name: Kyton's Battledance
Kyton's Battledance.flavor: Inspired by the weaving tactics of chain devils, this stance has you weaving through the enemy forces with diabolical grace.
Kyton's Battledance.effect: Once a turn you can spend a minor action to shift 1 square.

Glasya's Stride.name: Glasya's Stride
Glasya's Stride.flavor: As manipulative as the mistress of Malbolge, this exploit wreaks havoc among large groups of enemies.
Glasya's Stride.targets: A number of creatures within your melee reach at any point during your move up to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1).
Glasya's Stride.attack: Strength vs. AC, one attack per target
Glasya's Stride.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and slide the target 1 square.
Glasya's Stride.onMiss: Strength modifier damage and slide the target 1 square.

Pit Fiend's Fury.name: Pit Fiend's Fury
Pit Fiend's Fury.flavor: True power is the ability to prostrate the unwilling.
Pit Fiend's Fury.requirement: You must be wielding a polearm.
Pit Fiend's Fury.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage and knock the target prone.

Asmodeus's Gambit.name: Asmodeus's Gambit
Asmodeus's Gambit.flavor: Sometimes a minor sacrifice by a commander can yield swift and terrible action from the troops..
Asmodeus's Gambit.special: Before you make the attack, you grant combat advantage to all your enemies until the start of your next turn.
Asmodeus's Gambit.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target and opportunity attacks against the target gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier (save ends).
Asmodeus's Gambit.effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies making a melee attack against you provoke opportunity attacks from your allies.

Dragon's Tenacity.name: Dragon's Tenacity
Dragon's Tenacity.flavor: You and your companions become as fierce and indomitable as dragons, striking harder the more you all are hurt.
Dragon's Tenacity.target: You and each bloodied ally in the burst
Dragon's Tenacity.effect: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Dragon's Tenacity.special: If you are a dragonborn, the bonus to attack rolls is +3.

Inevitable Wave.name: Inevitable Wave
Inevitable Wave.flavor: You and your allies charge a foe with the relentless power of the incoming tide.
Inevitable Wave.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally who charges the target deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Inevitable Wave.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Rousing Assault.name: Rousing Assault
Rousing Assault.flavor: Your bold attack lends strength to your words of inspiration.
Rousing Assault.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you add your Charisma modifier to the hit points restored with any warlord healing power you use before the end of your next turn.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

Wild Runner Strike.name: Wild Runner Strike
Wild Runner Strike.flavor: You lash out at your foe, and you exhort your friends to see the advantages in the terrain.
Wild Runner Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target treats all squares as difficult terrain until the end of your next turn. You and your allies ignore difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.
Wild Runner Strike.resourcefulPresence: Until the end of your next turn, your allies can ignore difficult terrain even if you miss.

Harrying Warhound.name: Harrying Warhound
Harrying Warhound.flavor: Foes within your reach dare not ignore you, prompting them to drop their guard and allowing you to aim your strikes.
Harrying Warhound.effect: Until the stance ends, enemies within your reach grant combat advantage to your allies. You gain a +1 power bonus to melee attack rolls per ally adjacent to a target of your melee attacks, to a maximum of +4.

Coordinated Offensive.name: Coordinated Offensive
Coordinated Offensive.flavor: You draw the enemy’s attention long enough for one ally to move to safety and another to move into position.
Coordinated Offensive.special: If you used inspiring word on this turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Coordinated Offensive.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to you or to the target can shift 1 square as a free action.
Coordinated Offensive.effect: You slide one ally adjacent to you or to the target 1 square to a square adjacent to no enemies.

Provocative Order.name: Provocative Order
Provocative Order.flavor: You prompt an ally to take the fight to the enemy.
Provocative Order.target: One ally who has line of sight to you and can hear you
Provocative Order.effect: The target makes a charge attack as a free action. This attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

Lamb to the Slaughter.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
Lamb to the Slaughter.flavor: The enemy succumbs to your challenge and engages you—only to find more opponents than it expected.
Lamb to the Slaughter.onHit: You pull the target 5 squares, and one, two, or three allies within 5 squares of you who have line of sight to you and can hear you can make charge attacks against the target as free actions.

Devastating Offensive.name: Devastating Offensive
Devastating Offensive.flavor: You knock the enemy aside and call forth a nearby ally for a combined assault.
Devastating Offensive.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. You slide the target 1 square and slide one ally adjacent to you 3 squares to the square the target vacated. Then the ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.
Devastating Offensive.resourcefulPresence: Your ally gains a power bonus to attack rolls on the melee basic attack equal to one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum +1).
Devastating Offensive.tacticalPresence: Your ally gains a power bonus to damage rolls on the melee basic attack equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Road to Victory.name: Road to Victory
Road to Victory.flavor: Your sudden strike clears a path through the battlefield for your ally, and leaves open the option for more movement.
Road to Victory.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally within your line of sight can shift 1 square or move 3 squares as a free action.
Road to Victory.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when you use inspiring word on an ally, that ally can shift 1 square or move a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free action.

Bait the Hook.name: Bait the Hook
Bait the Hook.flavor: You give your champion the encouragement and strength needed to respond to the foe’s attacks.
Bait the Hook.effect: The target grants combat advantage to an ally within 5 squares of it and gains vulnerable to damage from that ally’s attacks equal to your Charisma modifier (save ends both).

Rousing Call.name: Rousing Call
Rousing Call.flavor: Fallen comrades cannot help but answer your call because your battle cry stirs the most melancholy hearts.
Rousing Call.effect: Each unconscious or dying ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw and each prone ally within 5 squares of you can take the stand up action as a free action.

Leader's Intercession.name: Leader's Intercession
Leader's Intercession.flavor: Brash impulse places you in the attack’s path to spare an ally from harm.
Leader's Intercession.trigger: An attack hits an adjacent ally
Leader's Intercession.effect: You and the target switch places. The attack hits you instead, and you or the target can spend a healing surge.

Stand Fast.name: Stand Fast
Stand Fast.flavor: You and your companions form an immovable wall to withstand the enemy tide.
Stand Fast.target: You and any ally in the burst
Stand Fast.effect: The target cannot be knocked prone, pushed, pulled, or slid until the end of your next turn. Also until the end of your next turn, when you use inspiring word on an ally, the ally can stand up as a free action.

Withering Courage.name: Withering Courage
Withering Courage.flavor: One strike from your weapon knocks the enemy off balance; each strike from an ally pushes it farther over the edge.
Withering Courage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn gives it a cumulative -1 penalty to its attack rolls until the end of your next turn, to a maximum of -5.
Withering Courage.bravuraPresence: Any ally adjacent to you gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier against the target until the end of your next turn.
Withering Courage.inspiringPresence: Any ally adjacent to you gains combat advantage against the target while it is taking a penalty to its attack rolls from this attack.

Awakened Wrath.name: Awakened Wrath
Awakened Wrath.flavor: Seeing your hurts, an ally explodes with unexpected violence.
Awakened Wrath.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Awakened Wrath.target: One ally with line of sight to you
Awakened Wrath.effect: The target makes a melee basic attack against each enemy adjacent to him or her as a free action. Then the target can shift 1 square for each enemy he or she hit as a free action, but the target must end this movement closer to you.

Teachable Moment.name: Teachable Moment
Teachable Moment.flavor: Your successes show your allies where the enemy is weak, and your failures show them where it is too strong.
Teachable Moment.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time you hit with a melee attack, one ally with line of sight to you gains a +3 power bonus to its next damage roll. Each time you miss with a melee attack, one ally with line of sight to you gains a +2 power bonus to its next attack roll.

Draw Their Eyes.name: Draw Their Eyes
Draw Their Eyes.flavor: You fix the enemy in your eyes, devoting yourself to defeating the foe at any cost.
Draw Their Eyes.effect: Move your speed. At the end of your movement, you grant combat advantage to and are marked by one enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn. While you are marked by this enemy, you gain a power bonus to your damage rolls against the enemy equal to your Strength modifier.

Warlord's Denial.name: Warlord's Denial
Warlord's Denial.flavor: With your stirring words, you prove that the enemy has no hold on you and your allies.
Warlord's Denial.target: You and any ally in the burst
Warlord's Denial.effect: The target makes a saving throw. Until the end of your next turn, when you use inspiring word on an ally, the ally can make a saving throw.

Invitational Assault.name: Invitational Assault
Invitational Assault.flavor: Your attack invites a nearby ally to join your struggle, and those who answer are the better for it.
Invitational Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide one ally within 5 squares of you 6 squares to a square adjacent to the target. That ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.
Invitational Assault.bravuraPresence: The ally grants combat advantage to the target until the end of your next turn, but he or she deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier when using its basic attack.
Invitational Assault.tacticalPresence: The ally gains a bonus to its attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Jarring Assault.name: Jarring Assault
Jarring Assault.flavor: Your fierce strike damages your foe’s ability to fight back.
Jarring Assault.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
Jarring Assault.inspiringPresence: If the target attacks an ally, the ally gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier before the attack hits or misses.
Jarring Assault.resourcefulPresence: The target’s penalty to attack rolls equals your Intelligence modifier.

Threatening Presence.name: Threatening Presence
Threatening Presence.flavor: You constantly move as though ready to attack, keeping your enemy’s nerves frazzled.
Threatening Presence.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Threatening Presence.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target cannot mark your allies and cannot gain combat advantage against your allies until the end of your next turn.
Threatening Presence.effect: Any ally marked by the target is no longer marked by the target.

Fearsome Thrust.name: Fearsome Thrust
Fearsome Thrust.flavor: Your enemy recoils before you—and right into the blades of your waiting allies.
Fearsome Thrust.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Fearsome Thrust.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a space adjacent to one of your allies. The target grants combat advantage to that ally until the start of your next turn.

Lingering Fear.name: Lingering Fear
Lingering Fear.flavor: So fearsome is your assault that your foe becomes timid about attacking your allies.
Lingering Fear.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Lingering Fear.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage, and until the end of the encounter, whenever the target hits or misses one of your allies, that ally gains combat advantage against the target until the start of the target’s next turn.
Lingering Fear.onMiss: Half damage, and until the end of your next turn, whenever the target hits or misses one of your allies, that ally gains combat advantage against the target until the start of the target’s next turn.

Battlefront Shift.name: Battlefront Shift
Battlefront Shift.flavor: As combat breaks out, you give a quick call, urging an ally to move or spurring yourself to take action.
Battlefront Shift.target: You or one ally in the burst
Battlefront Shift.effect: The target shifts half his or her speed.

Direct the Strike.name: Direct the Strike
Direct the Strike.flavor: You direct an ally to attack as an enemy lowers its guard.
Direct the Strike.effect: The target makes a basic attack as a free action against an enemy of your choice that you can see and is within 10 squares of you.

Intuitive Strike.name: Intuitive Strike
Intuitive Strike.flavor: Your strike puts your opponent off guard, allowing your allies to better exploit the enemy’s openings.
Intuitive Strike.onHit:
1[W] damage. Until the start of your next turn, the next ally who attacks the target and has combat advantage against it gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Level 21: 2[W] damage.

Paint the Bulls-Eye.name: Paint the Bulls-Eye
Paint the Bulls-Eye.flavor: You fire a red-fletched missile into your foe, creating a target for your allies to focus on when attacking the creature.
Paint the Bulls-Eye.onHit:
1[W] damage. Until the start of your next turn, your allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] damage.

Risky Shot.name: Risky Shot
Risky Shot.flavor: You wait until the last possible moment to strike, dealing a more potent blow at the expense of defense.
Risky Shot.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier + Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier + Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier damage.
Risky Shot.effect: You grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Pin Cushion.name: Pin Cushion
Pin Cushion.flavor: If your allies fire enough arrows at your foe, a few are bound to hit.
Pin Cushion.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a power bonus to ranged attack rolls against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Powerful Warning.name: Powerful Warning
Powerful Warning.flavor: You shout a warning that alerts your ally to an enemy attack, allowing your comrade to dodge and riposte.
Powerful Warning.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by an enemy
Powerful Warning.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Powerful Warning.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the attack. The target can make a melee basic attack against the enemy as a free action.
Powerful Warning.insightfulPresence: The bonus to your ally’s defenses equals 1 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

Race the Arrow.name: Race the Arrow
Race the Arrow.flavor: You catch your comrade’s eye and designate a target. You fire a shot that diverts your foe’s attention, giving your ally the chance to attack.
Race the Arrow.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally you can see can charge the target or make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.
Race the Arrow.skirmishingPresence: The ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Seize the Upper Hand.name: Seize the Upper Hand
Seize the Upper Hand.flavor: Your strike distracts your foe, forcing it to lower its defenses and create opportunities for your allies’ attacks.
Seize the Upper Hand.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, while you have combat advantage against the target, you and your allies deal extra damage to the target equal to your Charisma modifier.

Shielded Assault.name: Shielded Assault
Shielded Assault.flavor: You attack cautiously, protecting yourself and nearby allies with your shield.
Shielded Assault.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shielded Assault.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to AC while adjacent to you.

Vengeance is Mine.name: Vengeance is Mine
Vengeance is Mine.flavor: You respond to an enemy’s attack with a riposte, and you call for an ally to join you against the offender.
Vengeance is Mine.effect: You make a basic attack against the triggering enemy, and one ally within 5 squares of you can move his or her speed and make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy as a free action.

Create a Target.name: Create a Target
Create a Target.flavor: You swing at your foe, shoving it into the line of fire. The creature then continues to stagger around, disoriented and vulnerable.
Create a Target.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier. Whenever a pull, a push, or a slide forces the target to move, one of your allies can make a basic attack against the target as an opportunity action (save ends).
Create a Target.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Expert Timing.name: Expert Timing
Expert Timing.flavor: You deliver a blow to your foe and let out a call to your allies who, remembering their training, move nimbly around the battlefield.
Expert Timing.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You and each ally you can see gain a +1 power bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.
Expert Timing.onMiss: Half damage. You and each ally you can see gain a +1 power bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.

Inspiring Shot.name: Inspiring Shot
Inspiring Shot.flavor: Your shot strikes an enemy hard, proving that victory is near.
Inspiring Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, your healing powers restore additional hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Leader's Instincts.name: Leader's Instincts
Leader's Instincts.flavor: You strike at your foe with a skillful thrust. As your opponent is about to dodge, you call for an ally to attack.
Leader's Instincts.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. As a free action, one ally you can see can make a basic attack against the target with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

Relentless Wounding.name: Relentless Wounding
Relentless Wounding.flavor: Your attack wounds a foe, making it susceptible to your allies’ assaults.
Relentless Wounding.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, your allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Encouraging Boost.name: Encouraging Boost
Encouraging Boost.flavor: You shout words of encouragement, giving your ally a necessary boost.
Encouraging Boost.effect: The target can use its second wind and regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Flash of Insight.name: Flash of Insight
Flash of Insight.flavor: Your weapon slips past a foe’s guard, allowing you to adjust your attack and throw the creature off balance.
Flash of Insight.trigger: An enemy is hit by your at-will weapon attack
Flash of Insight.effect: You knock the target prone or push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Hasty Alert.name: Hasty Alert
Hasty Alert.flavor: Your shout warns comrades of imminent danger in time for them to react.
Hasty Alert.trigger: A surprise round begins, and you are conscious
Hasty Alert.target: You and each surprised ally in the burst
Hasty Alert.effect: Each target is not surprised and gains a bonus to AC and Reflex equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.

Spur to Action.name: Spur to Action
Spur to Action.flavor: Sensing your enemies’ advantage, you whisper quick orders that spur your allies into action.
Spur to Action.target: You and each ally in the burst
Spur to Action.effect: Each target can reroll his or her initiative but must use the second result.

Battering Command.name: Battering Command
Battering Command.flavor: You slam your weapon into your foe’s gut and cause the creature to double over, enabling an ally to smash it.
Battering Command.effect: One ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.

Deadly Distraction.name: Deadly Distraction
Deadly Distraction.flavor: You strike your foe hard, delivering a wound that keeps your enemy distracted while you and your allies retreat.
Deadly Distraction.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally adjacent to the target do not provoke opportunity attacks from it.

Inspire Resilience.name: Inspire Resilience
Inspire Resilience.flavor: You deliver a powerful hit that bolsters your ally or encourages your comrade to unleash an equally devastating blow.
Inspire Resilience.effect: One ally adjacent to you chooses either to gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn or to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
Inspire Resilience.resourcefulPresence: Instead of one ally, each ally adjacent to you either gains the bonus or gains temporary hit points.

No Gambit Is Wasted.name: No Gambit Is Wasted
No Gambit Is Wasted.flavor: Sensing that an ally is attempting a difficult deed, you distract your comrade’s foe and give him or her another chance to use the attack.
No Gambit Is Wasted.trigger: An ally misses every target with an encounter or a daily attack
No Gambit Is Wasted.target: One creature targeted by the triggering ally’s attack
No Gambit Is Wasted.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The triggering ally’s attack is not expended.
No Gambit Is Wasted.insightfulPresence: The triggering ally gains a bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

Staggering Shot.name: Staggering Shot
Staggering Shot.flavor: The impact of your shot leaves a foe reeling.
Staggering Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The first time the target moves during its next turn, you knock the target prone after the move.
Staggering Shot.skirmishingPresence: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Archery Commander.name: Archery Commander
Archery Commander.flavor: As your allies unleash ranged attacks, you thwart your enemies’ efforts to take advantage of your comrades’ distraction.
Archery Commander.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any ally within 2 squares of you do not provoke opportunity attacks when making ranged attacks.

Brave Warriors.name: Brave Warriors
Brave Warriors.flavor: Your charge emboldens your allies to do the same.
Brave Warriors.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain +1 power bonus to attack rolls when charging, and your allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls when charging while within your line of sight.
Brave Warriors.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Create Opportunity.name: Create Opportunity
Create Opportunity.flavor: Your precisely timed shots disrupt your foe’s concentration, buying time for an ally to act.
Create Opportunity.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target with a ranged attack, one ally adjacent to it can either make a melee basic attack against it as a free action or shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier as a free action.

Exemplar of Action.name: Exemplar of Action
Exemplar of Action.flavor: Your series of feints and slashes cows your foe, preparing it for your allies.
Exemplar of Action.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened and grants combat advantage (save ends both). Until the target is no longer affected by this power, your and your allies’ attacks deal 5 extra damage against the target.
Exemplar of Action.onMiss: The target is weakened and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. In addition, your and your allies’ attacks deal 2 extra damage against the target until the end of your next turn.

I've Got Your Back.name: I've Got Your Back
I've Got Your Back.flavor: Standing together, you and your comrades form a bastion that can withstand the enemy assault.
I've Got Your Back.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any ally adjacent to you gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex.

Anchor the Line.name: Anchor the Line
Anchor the Line.flavor: You help an ally stand or guide a friend back into formation.
Anchor the Line.effect: The target stands up, or you slide the target 1 square.

Form a Line.name: Form a Line
Form a Line.flavor: You raise your fist in the air, calling your allies to form a defensive front at your position.
Form a Line.effect: You designate a wall of defensive ground that lasts until the end of your next turn. The wall is 1 square high, and it must include a square you occupy. You and any ally within the wall gain a +1 power bonus to AC, or a +2 power bonus to AC while adjacent to an ally who is also within the wall.

Invigorating Shout.name: Invigorating Shout
Invigorating Shout.flavor: You call to an ally with words of inspiration, pushing your comrade to fight on.
Invigorating Shout.effect: The target regains one healing surge and also regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

Reassuring Gesture.name: Reassuring Gesture
Reassuring Gesture.flavor: Verbal reassurance is good, but a hearty clap on the shoulder is better.
Reassuring Gesture.trigger: You use inspiring word on your ally
Reassuring Gesture.effect: Your inspiring word also grants its target temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom or Charisma modifier.

Reorient the Axis.name: Reorient the Axis
Reorient the Axis.flavor: You realize that your allies need to adjust their formation, so you order several to move to new locations.
Reorient the Axis.effect: Each target can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free action.

Fierce Reply.name: Fierce Reply
Fierce Reply.flavor: You answer an attacker’s hit against an ally with a vicious riposte.
Fierce Reply.trigger: An enemy within 3 squares of you hits your ally
Fierce Reply.effect: Before your attack, you shift 2 squares.

General's Gift.name: General's Gift
General's Gift.flavor: You are generous as well as brave. Your presence alone keeps an ally from surrendering to weariness and wounds.
General's Gift.effect: Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally would spend a healing surge, you spend a healing surge on that ally’s behalf as a free action. You regain no hit points from spending the healing surge, and the ally gains the benefit as if he or she had spent the healing surge.

Join the Crowd.name: Join the Crowd
Join the Crowd.flavor: You swing at a nearby foe and drive it back into the area of an ally’s explosive attack.
Join the Crowd.trigger: An ally makes a close or an area attack
Join the Crowd.target: One creature not targeted by the triggering attack
Join the Crowd.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Join the Crowd.insightfulPresence: If the triggering attack hits the target, it deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

On My Mark.name: On My Mark
On My Mark.flavor: You catch the eye of your comrade and nod toward a foe. Together, you and the ally then strike.
On My Mark.effect: Choose one ally you can see to make a basic attack against the target as a free action. If your attack hit the target, the ally gains a power bonus to his or her attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.
On My Mark.skirmishingPresence: Before the attack, the chosen ally shifts 3 squares as a free action.

Sudden Motivation.name: Sudden Motivation
Sudden Motivation.flavor: Your passionate war cry inspires a burst of motivation in your allies, sending them darting across the battlefield.
Sudden Motivation.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Each ally within 5 squares of you gains an extra move action to use during his or her next turn.

Together We Survive.name: Together We Survive
Together We Survive.flavor: You yell in defiance as you land a solid blow. When your allies follow your example, you can see their confidence grow.
Together We Survive.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever an ally hits the target, that ally gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

Dangerous Leader.name: Dangerous Leader
Dangerous Leader.flavor: The most dangerous leader is the one who is able to hurt the enemy through helping comrades.
Dangerous Leader.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit with a charge, each ally within 5 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Dangerous Leader.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Eviscerating Shot.name: Eviscerating Shot
Eviscerating Shot.flavor: You aim for a vulnerable spot that will leave your foe too absorbed with its own suffering to withdraw.
Eviscerating Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends).
Eviscerating Shot.aftereffect: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Force of Fellowship.name: Force of Fellowship
Force of Fellowship.flavor: Having seen to the needs of your troops, you strike out with a powerful blow, buoyed by the strength of your deeds.
Force of Fellowship.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The attack deals 1[W] extra damage for each inspiring word you have used during this encounter, up to a maximum of 3[W] extra damage.
Force of Fellowship.effect: You can use your inspiring word one additional time during this encounter.

Ready the Charge.name: Ready the Charge
Ready the Charge.flavor: You push your foe back, clearing the path for your allies to charge the creature.
Ready the Charge.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 4 squares.
Ready the Charge.effect: Each ally who was adjacent to the target before the push can charge it as a free action.

Tactical Withdrawal.name: Tactical Withdrawal
Tactical Withdrawal.flavor: You land a final blow on the enemy and then command a temporary retreat.
Tactical Withdrawal.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks (save ends).
Tactical Withdrawal.onMiss: Half damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.
Tactical Withdrawal.effect: Each ally adjacent to the target can move his or her speed as a free action but must end in a space that is not adjacent to the target.

Covering Fire.name: Covering Fire
Covering Fire.flavor: You use the confusion generated by another attack to send an ally quickly into position.
Covering Fire.trigger: An ally makes an area or a close attack that targets an ally within 10 squares of you
Covering Fire.target: One ally in the burst targeted by the triggering attack
Covering Fire.effect: The target shifts a number of squares equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier as a free action.

Strength of Conviction.name: Strength of Conviction
Strength of Conviction.flavor: You create an area of calm even as violence rages around you.
Strength of Conviction.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge. Until the end of the encounter, your healing powers restore the maximum number of hit points possible.

Tactical Orders.name: Tactical Orders
Tactical Orders.flavor: You bark orders at your allies, commanding them to move into formation.
Tactical Orders.target: You and one ally in the burst
Tactical Orders.effect: Each target shifts his or her speed as a free action.

Bolstering Insight.name: Bolstering Insight
Bolstering Insight.flavor: You offer your ally a brief insight into a foe’s actions, preparing him or her for the enemy’s attack.
Bolstering Insight.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by an enemy’s attack
Bolstering Insight.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Bolstering Insight.effect: The target gains a +3 power bonus to all defenses against the enemy’s attack. If the attack misses the target, he or she can make a melee basic attack against the enemy as a free action with a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.
Bolstering Insight.insightfulPresence: The bonus to the target’s defenses equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

Death from Two Sides.name: Death from Two Sides
Death from Two Sides.flavor: You and your ally move into a tactically sound position and attack your foe with a coordinated assault.
Death from Two Sides.effect: You and one ally make a melee basic attack against the target. If both attacks hit, your ally’s attack is a critical hit.

Defensive Offense.name: Defensive Offense
Defensive Offense.flavor: You smash your weapon into your enemy and lock into formation with your allies, using your shield to shelter them.
Defensive Offense.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Defensive Offense.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex, and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex while adjacent to you.

Hope's Renewal.name: Hope's Renewal
Hope's Renewal.flavor: A solid blow against a foe helps you restore your allies’ faith.
Hope's Renewal.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Your inspiring word restores additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier or Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.
Hope's Renewal.resourcefulPresence: Add 3 to the number of hit points the power restores.

Impromptu Attack.name: Impromptu Attack
Impromptu Attack.flavor: As one ally’s weapon slips past an enemy’s guard, you encourage a couple of others to take advantage of the opening.
Impromptu Attack.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you hits an enemy with a melee attack
Impromptu Attack.insightfulPresence: The triggering ally’s attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.
Impromptu Attack.target: Two allies in the burst adjacent to the enemy
Impromptu Attack.effect: Each target can make a melee basic attack against the enemy as a free action.

Signal the Charge.name: Signal the Charge
Signal the Charge.flavor: Your shot signals your comrades to rush the foe.
Signal the Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally you can see can charge the target or make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.
Signal the Charge.skirmishingPresence: The ally gains a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence or Wisdom modifier.

Archery Duel.name: Archery Duel
Archery Duel.flavor: You shout words of inspiration to your allies, encouraging them to respond to your enemies’ artillery with shots of their own.
Archery Duel.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever a ranged attack hits an ally you can see, that ally can make a ranged basic attack against the attacker as an immediate reaction.

Band of Fellows.name: Band of Fellows
Band of Fellows.flavor: Your foe is a fool for thinking it escaped the brunt of your attack. You are only setting it up for your allies.
Band of Fellows.effect: Each ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Bravura Charge.name: Bravura Charge
Bravura Charge.flavor: Your powerful charge inspires your allies, filling them with vigor and courage.
Bravura Charge.effect: Each ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge.
Bravura Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Comrade in Arms.name: Comrade in Arms
Comrade in Arms.flavor: As you and your ally work together to defeat a foe, you both develop a bond that provides an advantage throughout combat.
Comrade in Arms.trigger: An enemy is hit by your ally
Comrade in Arms.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit an enemy, the ally gains a power bonus to his or her next attack roll against that enemy. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier and lasts until the end of your next turn.

Forbidden Ground.name: Forbidden Ground
Forbidden Ground.flavor: You declare the space in front of you to be forbidden, and any enemy that dares to enter it will suffer the consequences.
Forbidden Ground.effect: The blast creates an area of forbidden ground. Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy enters the area, you or an ally can charge that enemy or make a melee basic attack against it as an immediate reaction.

Help or Hinder.name: Help or Hinder
Help or Hinder.flavor: You offer words of encouragement to an ally or shout words of discouragement to an enemy.
Help or Hinder.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you saves, or an ally within 5 squares of you fails a saving throw
Help or Hinder.target: The triggering enemy or ally in the burst
Help or Hinder.effect: The target rerolls the saving throw. If the target is an enemy, it takes a penalty to the saving throw equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier. If the target is an ally, he or she gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Press on Together.name: Press on Together
Press on Together.flavor: One of your allies overcomes a debilitating effect, and you shout to your other comrades to do the same.
Press on Together.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you saves against an effect
Press on Together.target: You and each ally in the burst
Press on Together.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a power bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

Share the Weight.name: Share the Weight
Share the Weight.flavor: You foster the spirit of teamwork among your allies and inspire one of them to take a blow meant for another.
Share the Weight.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you is hit by an attack
Share the Weight.target: You or one ally in the burst; the target must be adjacent to the triggering ally
Share the Weight.effect: The target and the triggering ally swap places, and the attack hits the target and misses the triggering ally.

Disabling Missile.name: Disabling Missile
Disabling Missile.flavor: Your carefully aimed shot leaves a foe unable to concentrate on defending itself.
Disabling Missile.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally adjacent to the target can shift 1 square as a free action. Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks from your allies whenever it attacks.
Disabling Missile.skirmishingPresence: You and your allies gain a power bonus to melee damage rolls against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier. The power bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.

Forced Respect.name: Forced Respect
Forced Respect.flavor: Your strike forces your foe to respect you and your ally, making it think twice before confronting the two of you again.
Forced Respect.trigger: An enemy hits your ally with a melee attack
Forced Respect.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
Forced Respect.insightfulPresence: One ally can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Pincer Shot.name: Pincer Shot
Pincer Shot.flavor: Your arrow drives a foe backward onto the blade of your ally
Pincer Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier. After the push, one of your allies adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. The attack deals extra damage equal to the number of squares you pushed the target.

We Will Not Fail.name: We Will Not Fail
We Will Not Fail.flavor: Your wild strike distracts your foe, giving an ally the chance to strike the creature.
We Will Not Fail.trigger: You miss an enemy with an attack
We Will Not Fail.effect: The target can make a basic attack against the enemy as a free action. The attack deals extra damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Anticipate the Target.name: Anticipate the Target
Anticipate the Target.flavor: Your ally’s strike drives a foe forward, and you snap off a shot. You then study the enemy and watch for it to drop its guard again.
Anticipate the Target.trigger: An enemy is hit by your ally
Anticipate the Target.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and whenever the target moves during its turn, one ally you can see can make a basic attack against the target as an opportunity action (save ends).

Assault of the Ram.name: Assault of the Ram
Assault of the Ram.flavor: You and your comrades hurl yourselves at opponents and gain the upper hand through your audacity.
Assault of the Ram.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or an ally charges, you or the ally gains combat advantage against the target of the charge for that attack.
Assault of the Ram.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Dance on Their Graves.name: Dance on Their Graves
Dance on Their Graves.flavor: Your blow shows your allies how best to attack your enemy, and with each subsequent strike, you adapt your strategy to keep your foe off balance.
Dance on Their Graves.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Dance on Their Graves.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target, it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

End to Games.name: End to Games
End to Games.flavor: Your strike leaves a foe reeling, and as your allies beat on the creature, their vigor and morale improve.
End to Games.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). While the target is stunned by this power, whenever an ally hits the target, he or she can spend a healing surge.
End to Games.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Leader of the Bowmen.name: Leader of the Bowmen
Leader of the Bowmen.flavor: Your shot signals the beginning of a barrage. Your leadership guides your allies’ fire and helps alert them to nearby foes.
Leader of the Bowmen.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to ranged attack rolls and do not provoke opportunity attacks for making ranged attacks.
Leader of the Bowmen.special: You can use this power in place of a ranged basic attack.

Courageous Insight.name: Courageous Insight
Courageous Insight.flavor: You have a sixth sense that tells you when your allies are in danger. Recognizing your ally’s peril, you dart over to help.
Courageous Insight.trigger: An ally drops to 0 hit points or fewer from an enemy’s attack that doesn’t target you
Courageous Insight.effect: The attack hits you instead of the target, and the target can spend a healing surge.

Defensive Ground.name: Defensive Ground
Defensive Ground.flavor: You identify a section of the battlefield that offers a defensive advantage, and you direct your allies to secure it.
Defensive Ground.effect: Each ally in the blast gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier. The blast creates an area of defensible terrain. Until the end of the encounter, any ally within the area that has cover except that provided by intervening allies instead has superior cover.

Hidden Opportunity.name: Hidden Opportunity
Hidden Opportunity.flavor: You spot a hole in an enemy’s defenses and tell your ally to seize the opportunity.
Hidden Opportunity.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you hits with an opportunity attack
Hidden Opportunity.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Hidden Opportunity.effect: The target scores a critical hit with the attack.

Pull out the Stops.name: Pull out the Stops
Pull out the Stops.flavor: Your leadership lets your comrades achieve more than ever seemed possible.
Pull out the Stops.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any ally you can see can spend an action point, even if that ally already spent one or more during this encounter. An ally can spend only one action point per turn.

Defender's Retort.name: Defender's Retort
Defender's Retort.flavor: You run to your ally’s aid and strike out at an advancing enemy.
Defender's Retort.trigger: An enemy within 3 squares of you hits your ally
Defender's Retort.effect: Before you attack, you shift 2 squares.

Halting Missile.name: Halting Missile
Halting Missile.flavor: You fire a shot at an enemy that is pressing down on an ally. Your attack debilitates the foe and gives your ally temporary respite.
Halting Missile.trigger: An enemy hits your ally with a melee attack
Halting Missile.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the ally regains hit points equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.
Halting Missile.skirmishingPresence: The target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

Hold that Thought.name: Hold that Thought
Hold that Thought.flavor: Realizing your ally’s aim is off, you quickly strike the target of your comrade’s attack and try to distract it to help your ally hit.
Hold that Thought.trigger: An enemy is missed by your ally’s attack
Hold that Thought.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The ally can reroll his or her attack roll against the target and use either result.

Stunning Display.name: Stunning Display
Stunning Display.flavor: You drive your weapon into your enemy, shocking it. While the enemy is recovering, you give an ally a moment to recuperate.
Stunning Display.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn. One ally within 5 squares of you can use his or her second wind as a free action.
Stunning Display.insightfulPresence: The ally’s bonus to defenses from second wind equals +4 instead of +2.

Wave of War.name: Wave of War
Wave of War.flavor: Your vigorous charge inspires your allies to move forward and encircle your foes.
Wave of War.effect: Each ally within 5 squares of you can move his or her speed as a free action.
Wave of War.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Forceful Leader.name: Forceful Leader
Forceful Leader.flavor: Your charge inspires your allies. As they follow your lead, you shout encouragement that fills them with vigor.
Forceful Leader.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any ally who hits with a charge attack regains 5 hit points.
Forceful Leader.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Help Where It's Needed.name: Help Where It's Needed
Help Where It's Needed.flavor: You attempt to avenge your comrades. Seeing your efforts, your wounded allies feel invigorated and rejoin the fight.
Help Where It's Needed.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against each effect on him or her that a save can end.
Help Where It's Needed.effect: Any bloodied ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge as a free action and make a saving throw against one effect on him or her that a save can end.
Help Where It's Needed.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Herding Barrage.name: Herding Barrage
Herding Barrage.flavor: Your shots drive your foes into a tight cluster. You then signal for an ally to seize his or her chance to attack.
Herding Barrage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Herding Barrage.effect: One ally adjacent to each target can make a melee basic attack against that target as a free action.

Skirmisher's Command.name: Skirmisher's Command
Skirmisher's Command.flavor: Every shot you take strikes a foe where it is vulnerable and signals where allies should target it.
Skirmisher's Command.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy you hit with a ranged attack gains vulnerable 10 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Vigilant Commander.name: Vigilant Commander
Vigilant Commander.flavor: You lash out at an enemy, repaying it for everything you and your allies have suffered during the battle.
Vigilant Commander.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. The attack deals 1[W] extra damage for each inspiring word you have used during this encounter, up to a maximum of 4[W].
Vigilant Commander.effect: You regain the use of any expended inspiring word uses.

Combined Arms Assault.name: Combined Arms Assault
Combined Arms Assault.flavor: You fire at an enemy, prompting a pair of nearby allies to charge or shoot the foe.
Combined Arms Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. One or two allies you can see can choose either to charge the target or to make a ranged basic attack against the target as a free action.
Combined Arms Assault.skirmishingPresence: The allies gain a power bonus to the damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

Insightful Assault.name: Insightful Assault
Insightful Assault.flavor: With a whistle, you signal to your allies to assault an enemy from all sides.
Insightful Assault.target: You and one, two, or three allies in the burst
Insightful Assault.effect: Choose an enemy. Each target can make a basic attack against the chosen enemy as a free action.
Insightful Assault.insightfulPresence: The basic attacks deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

Raise the Bar.name: Raise the Bar
Raise the Bar.flavor: Your attack sets a standard of excellence that the rest of the party strives to match.
Raise the Bar.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Each ally you can see gains a power bonus to attack rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

Resourceful Triumph.name: Resourceful Triumph
Resourceful Triumph.flavor: Time seems to slow as you regard your foe. Then, deciding on the best place to strike, you deliver a potent attack.
Resourceful Triumph.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.
Resourceful Triumph.effect: The ally who was hit can spend a healing surge.

Break it Up.name: Break it Up
Break it Up.flavor: You send distracting shots at your foes, allowing allies to maneuver around the battlefield and launch new attacks.
Break it Up.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a ranged attack, one ally who is adjacent to that enemy can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence or Wisdom modifier and then make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. If no ally is adjacent to the enemy, one ally can make a ranged basic attack against it as a free action.

Legendary Charge.name: Legendary Charge
Legendary Charge.flavor: You charge forward, heedless of the dangers. Your speed and power inspire your allies to fight with renewed vigor.
Legendary Charge.effect: Each ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge as a free action.
Legendary Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Loyal Squadron.name: Loyal Squadron
Loyal Squadron.flavor: You never worry about the strength of your arm. You know that if you falter, your comrades will be there to back you up.
Loyal Squadron.onMiss: As a free action, each ally can make a melee basic attack against the target with a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence or Wisdom modifier.

Partners in Battle.name: Partners in Battle
Partners in Battle.flavor: You and your comrade assault an enemy in concert, forcing the creature to divide its attention.
Partners in Battle.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Partners in Battle.onMiss: As a free action, one ally you can see can make a basic attack against the target with a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier. On a hit, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn, and during your next turn, you can use this power against the target again.

Tactician's Invitation.name: Tactician's Invitation
Tactician's Invitation.flavor: Your strike leaves the opponent swaying so that a feather’s touch can cause it to move from its position.
Tactician's Invitation.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The next time an ally hits the target before the end of your next turn, that ally can slide the target 2 squares, shift 2 squares, or deal 4 extra damage to the target.

Destructive Surprise.name: Destructive Surprise
Destructive Surprise.flavor: You motivate an ally to strike true at just the right moment.
Destructive Surprise.requirement: The power Destructive Surprise must be active in order to use this power.

Martial Cascade.name: Martial Cascade
Martial Cascade.flavor: Your daring attack inspires an ally to follow your lead.
Martial Cascade.trigger: An enemy is hit by your attack
Martial Cascade.target: Each ally in the burst who can see you
Martial Cascade.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any target who spends an action point to make an attack against the triggering enemy gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

Interrupting Strike.name: Interrupting Strike
Interrupting Strike.flavor: Your weapon strikes the foe and, if it seeks to attack another, your waiting ally can attempt an attack of his or her own first.
Interrupting Strike.onHit: Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn. If the target makes an attack before the end of your next turn that does not include you as a target, one ally adjacent to the target can make a basic attack against it as an immediate interrupt. If the ally's attack hits, the target takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll.

Martial Doom.name: Martial Doom
Martial Doom.flavor: Your attack connects to expose an opening that any ally with will or daring can seize.
Martial Doom.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to your allies until the end of your next turn.
Martial Doom.effect: Any ally that hits the target with an attack gained from an action point before the end of your next turn deals 5 extra damage to the target.

Surging Assault.name: Surging Assault
Surging Assault.flavor: Your powerful strike gives an ally the means to recover from his or her injuries and rejoin the battle.
Surging Assault.effect: Each ally adjacent to you or the target can use his or her second wind as a free action.

Martial Vigor.name: Martial Vigor
Martial Vigor.flavor: When your attack connects, you experience a burst of confidence your allies can share if they follow your lead.
Martial Vigor.trigger: You hit an enemy with a martial melee or ranged attack
Martial Vigor.effect: You can spend a healing surge. Until the start of your next turn, any ally that hits the same target with an attack gained from an action point can also spend a healing surge.

Martial Excitation.name: Martial Excitation
Martial Excitation.flavor: Your attack’s success fills your allies with the urge to push further and fight harder.
Martial Excitation.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed.
Martial Excitation.effect: Until the start of your next turn, whenever an ally that can see you spends an action point, he or she can shift up to one-half his or her speed as a free action before or after the extra action.

Tactician's Favor.name: Tactician's Favor
Tactician's Favor.flavor: Your blow causes an ally’s follow-up strike to cement his or her tactical advantage.
Tactician's Favor.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The next time an ally hits the target before the end of your next turn, he or she gains one of the following benefits until the end of his or her next turn: +2 power bonus to all defenses, a +1 power bonus to attack rolls, or a +3 power bonus to damage rolls.

Coordinated Assault.name: Coordinated Assault
Coordinated Assault.flavor: By coordinating your efforts, your allies deliver two devastating attacks.
Coordinated Assault.effect: The target ally can shift 3 squares.
Coordinated Assault.requirement: The power Coordinated Assault must be active in order to use this power.
Coordinated Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier or Dexterity modifier damage, and the target falls prone.

Overwhelming Force Trap.name: Overwhelming Force Trap
Overwhelming Force Trap.flavor: You keep the order to spring the trap ready, allowing your allies to spring into action on a moment’s notice.
Overwhelming Force Trap.trigger: An ally in the burst makes a melee basic attack
Overwhelming Force Trap.effect: The target uses one of his or her melee at-will attack powers instead of making a melee basic attack. If the attack hits, the subject of the target’s attack is also dazed until the end of the target’s next turn.

Orchestrated Offensive.name: Orchestrated Offensive
Orchestrated Offensive.flavor: Your strike is the only signal your allies need to put your careful plan into motion.
Orchestrated Offensive.effect: Choose two different allies within 5 squares of you that can see and hear you. Each ally can make a charge attack, make a basic attack, or shift his or her speed as a free action. Allies that choose to charge or make basic attacks cannot attack the same creature or the target of this attack.

Cunning Adjustment.name: Cunning Adjustment
Cunning Adjustment.flavor: Your strike creates an opening your ally seizes to his or her advantage.
Cunning Adjustment.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack.
Cunning Adjustment.effect: The target shifts 3 squares as a free action and gains combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

Set the Trap.name: Set the Trap
Set the Trap.flavor: You grab the enemy’s attention with an aggressive strike to give your allies a chance to set up their own attacks.
Set the Trap.effect: One ally you can see can shift half his or her speed as a free action to a square where it has cover or concealment and make a Stealth check to become hidden. Before the end of your next turn, that ally gains a +3 power bonus to his or her next damage roll made against an enemy from which he or she is hidden.

Directed Combat.name: Directed Combat
Directed Combat.flavor: Your strike creates the opening an ally needs to slip away, while another ally rushes in to keep the foe pinned down.
Directed Combat.effect: One ally adjacent to the target shifts his or her speed as a free action. Then, choose a different ally within 5 squares of you that can see and hear you. That ally makes a charge attack against the target.

Get Down!.name: Get Down!
Get Down!.flavor: Your barked order draws attention to you long enough for a covered or concealed ally to hide.
Get Down!.effect: The target can shift half his or her speed as a free action to a square where he or she has cover or concealment and make a Stealth check with a +5 power bonus to become hidden.

Friendly Fire.name: Friendly Fire
Friendly Fire.flavor: Such is your presence that you panic an enemy into accidentally hitting one of its allies.
Friendly Fire.trigger: An enemy misses you or an ally you can see with a melee or ranged attack.
Friendly Fire.effect: The target repeats the attack as a free action against a creature you choose within 2 squares of the target of its original attack. The new target must still be legal for the attack.

Shift the Field.name: Shift the Field
Shift the Field.flavor: Swinging your weapon calls your allies to strike. If the plan works, you all adjust your positions to respond the battlefield’s new developments.
Shift the Field.effect: Choose two allies within 5 squares of you that can both see and hear you. Each ally makes a basic attack as a free action against different creatures that are not the targets of this attack.

Judicious Action.name: Judicious Action
Judicious Action.flavor: An ally’s efforts are renewed against those you oppose.
Judicious Action.trigger: An ally in the burst misses all targets with an attack when using an action gained by spending an action point
Judicious Action.effect: The target gains 1 action point. Spending this action point does not count against the limits on action point expenditures for this encounter. If the target does not spend the action point before the end of the encounter, it is lost.

Blade Burst Trap.name: Blade Burst Trap
Blade Burst Trap.flavor: Your careful preparations unleash a devastating trap, but you are experienced enough to let them go should your situation change.
Blade Burst Trap.trigger: An enemy in the burst hits you or an ally with an attack.
Blade Burst Trap.target: One ally adjacent to triggering enemy
Blade Burst Trap.effect: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against each enemy adjacent to him or her. If the attack hits, the enemy is also dazed until the end of the target’s next turn.

Call to Action.name: Call to Action
Call to Action.flavor: A shouted command calls your allies to act, helping them to find new reserves or driving them to strike your enemies down.
Call to Action.target: One, two, or three targets that can hear you in the burst
Call to Action.effect: Each target can choose to spend a healing surge, make a basic attack, or make a charge attack as a free action. Each ally that makes an attack as a result of this effect must choose a different target and deals 1d10 extra damage on a hit.

Pincer Formation.name: Pincer Formation
Pincer Formation.flavor: Reading your enemy’s intent, you increase the pressure so it cannot escape your grasp.
Pincer Formation.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you moves or shifts
Pincer Formation.target: You and one ally in the burst adjacent to the triggering enemy
Pincer Formation.effect: The target shifts his or her speed and must end this shift in a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Vanishing Forces.name: Vanishing Forces
Vanishing Forces.flavor: An aggressive attack draws attention away from your allies so they can move into position while remaining unseen.
Vanishing Forces.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked by you until the end of your next turn.
Vanishing Forces.effect: Each ally within 5 squares of you that you can see shifts his or her speed as a free action to a square with cover or concealment and makes a Stealth check to become hidden. Before the end of your next turn, each of those allies gains a +5 power bonus to its next damage roll made against an enemy from which it is hidden.

War Dance.name: War Dance
War Dance.flavor: One attack from you sees each ally moving into planned positions and striking with speed and force.
War Dance.effect: Each ally that can see and hear you within 5 squares of you can shift his or her speed as a free action. Each of these allies gains 10 temporary hit points the first time he or she hits with an attack made before the end of your next turn.

Critical Misfire.name: Critical Misfire
Critical Misfire.flavor: When your enemies are victims of friendly fire, they experience a critical failure in their battle plan.
Critical Misfire.trigger: An enemy misses you or an ally you can see with a melee or ranged attack
Critical Misfire.effect: The target repeats the attack as a free action against a creature you choose within 2 squares of the original target of the triggering attack and deals 2d10 extra damage on a hit. The new target must still be legal for the attack.

Sound the Retreat.name: Sound the Retreat
Sound the Retreat.flavor: When your doom casts its shadow upon you, you sound the retreat, compelling your allies to quit the battlefield.
Sound the Retreat.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Sound the Retreat.target: You and each ally in the burst
Sound the Retreat.effect: The target shifts a number of squares as a free action equal to his or her speed.

Warlord's Fury.name: Warlord's Fury
Warlord's Fury.flavor: You hurl the enemies back onto your allies’ waiting weapons.
Warlord's Fury.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage and you slide the target 5 squares. The target takes 1[W] extra damage for each of your allies adjacent to it at the end of the slide.
Warlord's Fury.onMiss: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage and you slide the target 2 squares.

A Plan Comes Together.name: A Plan Comes Together
A Plan Comes Together.flavor: You read the enemy’s intent and spring your trap. Your allies bring the unsuspecting foe down.
A Plan Comes Together.trigger: An enemy in the burst starts its turn
A Plan Comes Together.primaryTarget: One ally adjacent to the triggering enemy
A Plan Comes Together.effect: The primary target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against the triggering enemy; on a hit, the target is dazed. Then, the secondary target makes a charge attack as a free action against the triggering enemy; on a hit, the target falls prone.

Victory by Design.name: Victory by Design
Victory by Design.flavor: Leading with an attack announces the start of your cunning stratagem.
Victory by Design.effect: Choose up to four allies within 10 squares of you that can see and hear you. Each ally can either make a charge attack, make a basic attack, or shift up to his or her speed as a free action. The allies that choose to charge or make basic attacks deal 1d10 extra damage on a hit and cannot attack the same target or the target of this attack.

Terrain Dominance.name: Terrain Dominance
Terrain Dominance.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Terrain Dominance.flavor: You drive your foe into hindering terrain, showing your allies how to utilize the battlefield to their advantage.
Terrain Dominance.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 3 squares. If the target ends this slide in difficult terrain, it falls prone.
Terrain Dominance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against targets on difficult terrain.
